King_Fahd of Saudi_Arabia is to resume his duties after a long convalescence , the Saudi news agency SPA reported Thursday . the report said the king had informed the Crown_Prince Abdallah_bin_Abdel_Aziz , who stood in for him during the interim , that his mission was at an end , SPA said . in the message Fahd , 74 said had `` recovered after convalescing '' . the king expressed his `` thanks for the efforts '' of Prince_Abdallah . Fahd has been convalescing since December 7 officially as a result of `` overwork '' . but medical and diplomatic sources said he had had a stroke .
president Bill_Clinton said Monday he intends to run for re-election in 1996 with vice president Al_Gore as his running mate . `` if he is willing that would be my intention , '' Clinton , who has previously stated his intention to run for re-election , said in a CNN interview seated next to Gore . Gore , a former Tennessee senator who has had a high-profile role in the Clinton admninistration , said he considered it `` a privilege '' to be part of the White_House and would be willing run again with Clinton next year .

Helms , 75 , has been a thorn in president Bill_Clinton 's side on foreign policy issues . the senator is widely known here for co-authoring the helms-burton law that tightens US sanctions against Cuba , and that has led to sharp disagreements between the United_States and several of its allies , notably Canada and European_Union countries .
Algerian president Liamine_Zeroual is to visit China from October 17 to 21 , the official APS news agency reported on Thursday , quoting government officials . the trip had been announced on September 25 by Chinese foreign minister Qian_Qichen in New_York , without the precise dates being disclosed . it would be the third visit to China by an Algerian head of state . in its report , APS added that Zeroual would proceed to Vietnam after China , as he pursues his official trips abroad `` at the invitation of heads of states of Arab and Asian countries . '' .
war with Iraq is still not inevitable , un secretary general Kofi_Annan said Wednesday , following a key US presentation to the UN_Security_Council outlining Iraqi defiance of un disarmament demands . `` i still believe that war is not inevitable , '' Annan said , indicating the United_States was still willing to consider a peaceful resolution to the issue of disarming Iraq . `` US officials have said all along that they do not believe that war is inevitable , provided that Iraq complies , '' he said . `` even at this stage , they are not saying peace is out . '' .
Lithuanian international Saulius_Mikoliunas has been suspended for two matches after being found guilty of diving in the euro 2008 qualifying match against Scotland , UEFA said Thursday . the hearts player will miss the matches against France on October 17 and Ukraine on November 17 after being found guilty of `` deceiving the referee -lrb- by diving -rrb- '' during the 3-1 loss to Scotland in Glasgow on September 9 . Lithuania scored from the penalty which was awarded in the 61st minute by Slovenian referee Damir_Skomina after Mikoliunas went to ground .

Turkey has agreed to the start of exploration work for Russia 's South_Stream pipeline in its territorial waters as part of a deal signed Thursday , Turkish prime minister Recep_Tayyip_Erdogan said . `` in line with the spirit of our bilateral relations , we have given the permission to Russia 's request to carry out the necessary survey for the realization of the South_Stream project '' in Turkish waters , Erdogan told a joint press conference with his visiting Russian counterpart Vladimir_Putin . the agreement was part of an accord on natural gas cooperation signed by the two leaders , he added .

Two young moslems detained by the Bosnian_Serbs since March on charges of laying land mines were freed on Tuesday , a Bosnian official said . but a third youngster , Jasmin_Sljivo , who suffers from epilepsy , was still in the hands of the Bosnian_Serbs , said the head of the missing persons commission , Amor_Masovic . Sljivo , who was also arrested on March 22 , has been accused of war crimes , Masovic told Bosnian television . during the first meeting of the new-style three-member Bosnian presidency representing the moslems , croats and Serbs on Monday , they agreed to free all prisoners captured during almost four years of war .

Belgium has received reports that `` a genocide is underway '' in areas of eastern Zaire held by mainly tutsi rebels , Belgian officials said Tuesday . `` we have received reports from several different sources in the region that indicate that a genocide is underway , '' Wouter_Vermeulen , spokesman for Belgian development minister Reginald_Moreels , told AFP . `` we have testimonies from people on the spot who have witnessed the massacres and seen the mass graves , '' he added . informed Belgian sources said Moreels had received a report from the region that 500,000 people hutu refugees had disappeared . the document also reported the existence of mass graves near the Mugunga and Katale refugee camps .

Egyptian intelligence chief Omar_Suleiman -- who has acted as go-between in the negotiations between Israel and the militants -- conveyed the news to a delegation from the Islamist_Hamas group which controls Gaza earlier in the day , the news agency added .

Annan spoke to reporters after being briefed by French , British and Dutch oficials on plans for the special force .

Russia will take over both the debts and assets held by the former Soviet_Union , Massol explained .

French president Jacques_Chirac spoke on the telephone with German chancellor Gerhard_Schroeder and his predecessor Helmut_Kohl Tuesday to underline the strength of the franco-german relationship as the EU passes to the euro , his office said . `` what is happening today goes well beyond the economy . it is a major step in European contruction and formation of a European identity , '' his office quoted him as saying . all three men agreed the euro was also a testament to `` the success of the franco-german engine , '' Chirac 's office said , referring to the view that France and Germany are the key locomotives in EU affairs .

Hassan is traveling to Japan at the invitation of the research group , led by professor Hiroji_Nakagawa . a team sent by the group investigated the ancient monument at Giza twice last year and found that humidity and the wide variation in daytime and nightime temperatures were damaging the famed structure .

Bush also added that Monday was the deadline for the international community to find common ground on the stand-off with Baghdad . `` tomorrow is the day that we will determine whether or not diplomacy can work , '' he said .

J._Peter_Grace , who headed W.R._Grace for 47 years and built it into a publicly-held industrial giant , died Wednesday at the age of 81 , his family and the company said . his death came a month after his forced retirement from W.R._Grace , following disagreements with the group 's major shareholders over perks given to the Grace family . J._Peter_Grace led the company founded by his granfather from 1945 to 1992 . he also was an adviser to presidents Dwight_Eisenhower , John_Kennedy and Ronald_Reagan . Reagan named him to head a presidential commission on government waste , which came to known as the Grace commission .

Hossein_Kamali , 32 , strangled his wife Daniella and threw her mutilated body in a well at his father 's poultry farm , the court in amol , northeast of Tehran , decided . newspapers said the couple married in Romania , where Kamali was a student , despite the objections of his parents who wanted him to marry an Iranian woman .
un secretary general Kofi_Annan arrived in Tehran Friday evening for two days of meetings with Iranian leaders on the rebuilding of Afghanistan , an AFP correspondent said . `` Iran is an important country which has good relations with Afghanistan , and i think it can play an important role for the reconstruction of Afghanistan , '' Annan told reporters upon his arrival . `` all neighbouring countries should play such a role , '' said the un chief , who was accompanied by the un 's top envoy to Afghanistan , Lakhdar_Brahimi .

Chung will conduct the Paris orchestra in performances of mahler 's fifth symphony and Olivier_Messiaen 's `` offrandes oubliees . '' Chung worked with Messiaen shortly before the composer 's death . the Paris_Opera broke Chung 's contract amid protests from the conductor 's fans as part of an economy drive .
Lu_Chen won China 's first ever figure skating world title here on Saturday , when she became the women 's individual world champion . France 's Surya_Bonaly was second and American Nicole_Bobek finished third . Lu 's victory came as American Bobek , who had been leading after Friday 's technical programme , failed to deliver the goods in Saturday 's free section -- in which she finished a disappointing fourth after falling twice . Lu won the free skate , ahead of Bonaly , who was runner-up in this competition last year . the French woman had been lying fourth after Friday 's programme .
Petula_Clark will next month resume the glittering role of Norma_Desmond , heroine of Andrew_Lloyd_Weber 's musical version of the film `` Sunset_Boulevard , '' the evergreen British actress and singer revealed Friday . flushed with success from a six-week spell as Norma in September , 62 - year-old Clark will now embark on an eight-week run at the West_End adelphi theatre . `` it is one of the great women 's roles so i could hardly refuse . it 's a tremendous challenge because it is not like anything i have ever done before , '' Clark said .
Five of the nine British prisoners being held at a United_States military base in Guantanamo_Bay , Cuba , are to be returned to Britain `` in the next few weeks '' , foreign secretary Jack_Straw said Thursday . Straw said that discussions were continuing with the US authorities over the other four britons held at the military base .
Swedish foreign trade minister Mats_Hellstroem will visit the United_States next week for talks with US trade representatiave Mickey_Kantor , the Foreign_Ministry announced in Stockholm on Friday . he will talk with Kantor and other officials about future trade relationships between the two countries as well as about trade between the United_States and the European_Union -lrb- EU -rrb- . the new World_Trade_Organization -lrb- WTO -rrb- will also be discussed .
Tunisian prime minister Hamed_al-Karawi is due here Sunday for a three-day official visit at the invitation of his Jordanian counterpart Abdelkarim_Kabariti , the prime minister 's office said . karawi is to hold talks on the Middle_East peace process and relations between the two Arab countries . Tunisia last week put off a planned visit by Israeli opposition leader and former prime minister Shimon_Peres , apparently because of the deadlock in the peace process . Israel and Tunisia established trade relations earlier this year , while Jordan signed a peace treaty with the jewish state in October 1994 .
Sergei_Gerassimov , who was named Moscow 's interim general prosecutor last month after the previous holder was fired , has been confirmed in the post , the Interfax_agency said Tuesday . Gerassimov replaces Gennady_Ponomarev , who was dropped after the killing of well-known journalist Vladislav_Listiyev that triggered sharp criticism of Ponomarev 's office . Gerassimov had served as Ponomarev 's assistant prosecutor .
Three Ivory_Coast journalists have been summoned by a tribunal for accusing Mamadou_Coulibaly , the speaker of the national assembly , of embezzlement , the editor-in-chief of Le_Jour daily said Thursday . Vicky_Delore told AFP that three people from the independent newspaper , including himself , had been summoned to appear before the tribunal on Tuesday . in April , Le_Jour published an article accusing Coulibaly , who earlier served as finance minister , of involvement in the alleged embezzlement of millions of CFA francs belonging to ex-president Henri_Konan_Bedie . Bedie was toppled in a military coup in December 1999 .
French president Nicolas_Sarkozy on Tuesday hit out at the crackdown on protests in Myanmar and said he would meet in Paris on Wednesday with exiled opposition figures to express his support . `` tomorrow i will receive a delegation from the Burmese opposition in exile , '' Sarkozy said at a press conference on the sidelines of the UN_General_Assembly session here . `` i will show France 's support . we do not accept violent repression . '' Sarkozy added : `` i am following the situation in Burma with great concern . i call for spontaneous , peaceful protests , which are expressing fair social and political demands , not to be repressed by force . '' .
a first contingent of French police officers will head to Afghanistan on Monday on a mission to train and protect the war-torn country 's police , the police said Saturday . Fifty-seven police officers are due to fly to Afghanistan on Monday , setting off from a Paris airport . most of the officers are from a force in chauny , northern France , and will work in Nijrab and Tagab to the northeast of Kabul . a total of 150 French police officers will be deployed in the country by December 1 . they will be involved in the training of the Afghan police and escorting police patrols .
Polish president Lech_Walesa reiterated his request Monday for defense minister Piotr_Kolodziejczyk to resign by sending him a handwritten letter , government spokesman Leszek_Spalinski said . Walesa initially asked Kolodziejczyk to resign 10 days ago in front of most of the higher military command which heavily criticized the defense minister . Spalinski said another ministerial post as Poland 's NATO representative has been offered to Kolodziejczyk . he added that Walesa was dissatisfied with reforms undertaken within the army and financial difficulties . if the defense minister refuses to resign , Walesa could ask his prime minister to fire him .
EU monetary affairs commissioner Pedro_Solbes said late Wednesday he had accepted the job of finance minister in Spain 's incoming Socialist_government . `` i accepted the offer '' , Solbes told AFP as he left a meeting of European_Socialist leaders here . the EU commissioner 's statement confirmed an earlier report from socialist sources in Madrid of his appointment , which had sparked broad speculation following the party 's victory in general elections on March 14 , three days after the Spanish train bombings .
Marc_Ravalomanana will remain `` president '' of Madagascar until the release of the official results of disputed elections in December , the man he has named as `` prime minister '' , Jacques_Sylla , said Friday . Sylla ruled out forming a transition government with politicians loyal to president Didier_Ratsiraka . he gave supporters of the head of state `` a few days '' to lift roadblocks they have set up to cripple the country 's capital Antananarivo , where Ravalomanana has set up his own administration .
China on Wednesday summoned Japan 's ambassador in Beijing to protest the visit to Tokyo by exiled uighur leader Rebiya_Kadeer , the foreign ministry said in a statement on its website . vice foreign minister Wu_Dawei summoned Japanese ambassador Yuji_Miyamoto to raise `` stern representations '' over Kadeer 's visit and `` demanding the Japanese government immediately take effective measures to deter -lrb- Kadeer -rrb- from engaging in anti-china separatist activities in Japan , '' the statement said .
US president George_W._Bush lauded screen icon Katharine_Hepburn , who died Sunday at the age of 96 , as `` one of the nation 's artistic treasures '' . `` Katharine_Hepburn delighted audiences with her unique talent for more than six decades . she was known for her intelligence and wit and will be remembered as one of the nation 's artistic treasures , '' Bush said in a statement issued by the White_House . `` laura joins me in sending our thoughts and prayers to her family , '' he said . Hepburn the winner of a record four acting oscars , died at her home in Old_Saybrook , Connecticut , after several years of fading health .

Diane_Kroeker , 55 , was still breathing when she was admitted at a hospital 60 kilometers -lrb- 37 miles -rrb- from where the accident occurred , said Rony_Sopon , a Red_Cross rescuer , but she died at the hospital . other canadians were on the boat with Kroeker . Sopon said one other person died in the accident , but Guatemala 's national police said it knew of only one death .

Thatcher was on her ninth trip to Japan .
Mariano_Carrera has been stripped of his WBA middleweight title after testing positive for the banned steroid clenbuterol , Argentine newspaper clarin reported on Tuesday . the Argentine boxer 's positive control came in December when he won the title from Spain 's Javier_Castillejo . Argentina 's WBA representative Sebastian_Contursi told the newspaper : `` the substance found is clenbuterol . '' clenbuterol is a steroid that helps increase muscle mass , reduce weight and improve breathing . Carrera 's agent Mario_Margossian denied his fighter had doped .
Greek border guards on Wednesday arrested 53 illegal immigrants along the Turkish border as well as their alleged Pakistani smuggler , a police source said . the illegal immigrants were aboard a tractor trailer after just having swum across the Evros_river separating Greece from Turkey . they allegedly paid 4,500 dollars -lrb- 3,300 euros -rrb- to the smuggler , who was to bring them to Salonika , the source said . the immigrants included kurds , pakistanis , Bangladeshis , iraqis and Palestinians .

Ron_Dennis will step down as the principal of Formula_One team McLaren on March 1 , he announced here on Friday . the announcement came as McLaren unveiled their new car for the 2009 season at the team 's headquarters . Dennis , who has been running the team since 1981 , bows out at the top after masterminding Lewis_Hamilton 's rise to the top of Formula_One . Hamilton last year secured the team 's first drivers championship since 1999 . Martin_Whitmarsh will take over as team principal with Dennis retaining his role as chief executive of the McLaren_Group of companies .

Tafer improved his record to 22-6 while Ilyin suffered his first loss after 17 straight wins .

Viktar_Zuyeu of Belarus and Chinese olympic silver-medallist Zhang_Zhilei won the bronze medals .
gunmen Friday shot and killed an influential tribal chief and former mp under Saddam_Hussein 's ousted regime , police in the main northern Iraqi city of Mosul said . the assassins opened fire from a car at Sheikh_Talal salim al-khalidi , head of the Khalidiya tribe , as he left prayers at a local mosque , said captain jalal ezzeddin kassem . Talal 's son saad was also killed and his brother severely wounded . the chief had survived three previous assassination attempts since May . Talal was a member of the Nineveh municipal council and had been a representative in parliament before US and British troops toppled Saddam 's dictatorial regime last April .

Germany 's Aljona_Savchenko , a hot favourite for the olympic paris title in Vancouver next month with skating partner Robin_Szolkowy , is suffering from glandular fever . Moasher will meet French foreign minister Dominique_de_Villepin to discuss Israeli-Palestinian peace talks , following the adoption of the `` roadmap '' peace plan , the same source said . the situation in Iraq will also be on the agenda of meetings between the two foreign ministers , with both France and Jordan hoping that iraqis will soon be able to govern their own country , the source added .

Japan and the United_States will hold working-level `` framework '' trade talks in Washington in early June , government sources said on Friday . the talks on June 2-3 will centre on motor vehicles and related parts , the sources said . Tokyo and Washington agreed on Tuesday to resume framework negotiations , aimed at cutting Japan 's huge trade surplus with the United_States . framework talks have been suspended since February when the then Japanese prime minister Morihiro_Hosokawa and US president Bill_Clinton failed to reach agreement .
US president George_W._Bush will welcome Polish prime minister Leszek_Miller to the White_House January 11 , the White_House announced in a statement Monday . `` the visit reflects the close and allied relationship between the United_States and Poland . a new and committed members of the NATO_alliance , Poland has given solid support to fighting the war on terrorism , '' the statement said .
EU_finance_ministers Tuesday issued France with an `` early warning '' over its bulging budget deficit , but French_Finance minister Francis_Mer resisted his colleagues ' demands that he fix his government 's finances , EU sources said . Mer opposed recommendations that France get its budget in balance by 2006 and that it cut its public deficit by 0.5 percentage points of gross domestic product -lrb- gdp -rrb- per year , the sources said . the French government expects a deficit of 2.6 percent of gdp this year , but the European_Commission has warned that it is at `` large '' risk of breaching a euro-zone limit of 3.0 percent .
Brazil would challenge in the World_Trade_Organization a decision by president George_W._Bush to slap tariffs on imported steel , a Brazilian government official said Tuesday . `` Brazil will have to defend its interests , '' the official said on condition of anonymity . the official said the move would come if reports are accurate that Bush would impose up to 30 percent tariffs on imported steel . White_House spokesman Ari_Fleischer said Bush would make an official announcement on the decision , which he refused to characterize , later Wednesday .
the new US ambassador to Saudi_Arabia met Tuesday with president Bill_Clinton and prepared to assume the post vacant for nearly two years . `` the fact that i visited the president before i left showed the importance of this to the president , '' said Ray_Mabus , a former governor of Mississippi . `` the relationship between Saudi_Arabia and the United_States is an important and crucial one for both countries . '' Mabus said Clinton expressed concern at the meeting over the fighting in Yemen and reiterated a call for a ceasefire .

Merkel told Brown she hoped that under his leadership Britain and Germany would continue their close cooperation , the chancellery said in a statement . `` she expressed the wish to continue the close , trusting cooperation between the two governments , which is very important for Europe and for good transatlantic ties . Serbia on Thursday joined the international community in condemning the dismissal of Bosnian_Serb prime minister Rajko_Kasagic the previous day , the tanjug news agency reported . the agency carried a statement from the Serbian government calling the decision by hardline Serb leader Radovan_Karadzic to remove his moderate premier `` illegal , null and void . '' Kasagic , 53 , is seen by western governments as an acceptable alternative to the hardliners in the Bosnian_Serb hierarchy led by Karadzic , an indicted war crimes suspect . his dismissal has met with widespread condemnation , particularly from officials involved in efforts to implement the Dayton peace accords in Bosnia .

Frattini was due to travel on to Belgrade on Tuesday .

Lipponen was invited by Cheney , who he will meet Monday morning , but will also be seeing Bush in the afternoon on the same day , the prime minister 's office said . topics to be discussed are security policy issues , the situation in the Middle_East and Iraq , bi-lateral ties , as well as relations between the United_States and European_Union , of which Finland is a member , officials said .

Saddam_Hussein has lost control of most of Iraq , with US forces meeting only sporadic resistance as they push into Baghdad , US_Defense secretary Donald_Rumsfeld said Monday . `` the circle is closing and their options are running out , '' Rumsfeld said of Iraq 's leaders . he said the regime was quickly running out of `` real '' soldiers and would soon have only `` war criminals '' left to defend it . of Saddam , he said : `` we may not know if or where he is but we do know that he is no longer running much of Iraq . `` the Iraqi people are losing their fear of the regime and many are daring for the first time to imagine life without Saddam_Hussein . '' .

Guterres justified his decision to throw in the towel halfway through his second mandate by the need to prevent Portugal from turning into a `` political swampland '' at a time of international criisis and economic slowdown .

the head of Romania 's intelligence agency SRI , Virgil_Magureanu , resigned Thursday , presidential advisor Zoe_Petre said . Israel has sought a commitment that the money would not be given to the Palestinian police or Yasser_Arafat 's Palestinian_Authority . the official said they wanted to deposit it in an account managed directly by Fayad .

nobel literature laureate Alexander_Solzhenitsyn arrived in the far eastern Russian port of Vladivostok Friday after 20 years in exile . the author of `` the gulag archipegalo , '' his epic chronicle of the Soviet labour camp system , and `` a day in the life of Ivan_Denisovich , '' first set foot in his native Russia earlier in the day during a stopover at the far eastern city of magadan , a processing centre for the soviet-era Siberian labour camps . Solzhenitsyn is due to stay a few days in Vladivostok before spending several weeks travelling across Russia to take up residence in a dacha outside Moscow .

US fastfood giant McDonald 's says it will move its China headquarters from Hong_Kong to Shanghai next year , the state-run xinhua news agency reported early Tuesday . the general manager of McDonald 's China headquarters , Eric_Foo , said the move would help the chain expand its fast-growing market in China , xinhua reported . Foo said the Chinese mainland had become the chain 's largest potential market . McDonald 's opened its first Chinese restaurant in 1990 and now has more than 620 restaurants in China , xinhua said .
Sergei_Markidonov , a Russian liberal deputy , was assasinated overnight in the Chita region of southern Siberia , Russian news agencies reported Sunday . Markidonov , 34 , was due to run for a second term in the duma , Russia 's lower house of parliament , in general elections on December 17 . he represented the Chita constituency . he was visiting a village for an electoral rally at the time of his murder , the ITAR-TASS_news_agency said . there were no further details . Markidonov , an economist , headed the public property department for the Chita region from 1992 until 1993 when he entered parliament .

Seoul 's ban on US beef over fears of mad cow disease is not officially part of the free-trade agreement clinched over the weekend after 10 months of negotiations but US lawmakers have warned they would block any deal unless the issue is resolved .

Caso , born in 1959 , is also a newspaper columnist . the prize comes with a cash award of 601,000 euros -lrb- 895,096 dollars -rrb- .

France 's Francoise_Barre-Sinoussi and Luc_Montagnier shared the nobel medicine prize on Monday for their discovery of the hiv virus , along with a German scientist for his groundbreaking research into cervical cancer . Barre-Sinoussi and Montagnier discovered the human immunodeficiency virus -lrb- hiv -rrb- that causes aids . the other winner , Harald_zur_Hausen , went against current dogma and claimed that human papilloma virus -lrb- hpv -rrb- causes cervical cancer , the second most common cancer among women , the nobel jury said .

countess therese Leclerc de hautecloque , widow of a French world war ii general who liberated Paris from nazi occupation , died on Friday at the age of 92 . Leclerc de hautecloque died at the home of her son at Le_Mesnil - guillaume , near Lisieux in Normandy , northwest France . she was the widow of Philippe_Leclerc de hautecloque , commander of the second armoured division of free French forces , which fought its way through North_Africa and later took part in the Normandy landings with the allies in 1944 . the couple , who married in 1925 , had six children .

Japan has already offered to help the Bosnian peace process by sending funds , election observers and specialists to help form a market - oriented economy , a senior Japanese diplomat said last week .

German and American scientists have discovered a 300 million-year-old lizard 's skeleton in the Thueringen forest , near Gotha , central Germany , scientists said Friday . according to Thomas_Martens , curator of paleontology at Gotha 's Natural_History_Museum , the metre-long -lrb- three-foot -rrb- skeleton 's species has not been yet identified . the saurian group of reptiles originally included lizards , crocodiles and several extinct forms , but is now technically restricted to lizards . the primitve forms of vertebrate animals are not to be confused with dinosaurs which lived some 150 million years later and were larger , Martens explained .

Campbell led to the then-governing Progressive_Conservative_Party to a humiliating defeat in the 1993 general election , losing her own parliamentary seat at the same time . Chretien 's liberals swept to a comfortable majority while the progressive conservatives were reduced to just two seats in the federal House_of_Commons . Campbell , a lawyer by training , takes up her new job on September 16 .

France threatened Friday to withdraw its troops from Bosnia unless the United_Nations issued a new policy to take into account the safety of un troops , secretary general Boutros_Boutros-Ghali said Friday . Boutros-Ghali told reporters he had informed the UN_Security_Council at a meeting of French president Jacques_Chirac 's message calling for a new mandate . if it is not accepted , Chirac will pull out his nation 's troops , Boutros-Ghali said .
Russia will launch Ukraine and Chile 's first scientific satellites from its Plesetsk base in northwest Russia on August 30 , ITAR-TASS_news_agency reported Friday . the Ukrainian satellite will be used for oceanographic studies while the Chilean satellite , ordered by the country 's air force , will monitor the ozone layer . the agency report did not give details of the price paid by both countries for the launches .
The_International_Monetary_Fund -lrb- IMF -rrb- has given Tanzania six months to put its house in order to qualify for a 200 million dollar structural adjustment facility , IMF Africa director Evangelos_Calamitsis told reporters . he said Thursday that the IMF wanted to see the government of president Benjamin_Mkapa , inaugurated late last year , improve tax collection , streamline expenditure , and strengthen the state National_Bank_of_Commerce . Calamitsis , who met with Mkapa earlier in the week , said the government had agreed to tighten spending and remove tax exemptions , among other measures .

a Greek and a Turkish patrol boat collided Tuesday near a disputed islet in the Aegean_Sea , the Greek foreign ministry announced . the ministry said the incident took place in Greek territorial waters and pledged to take up the matter with the Turkish government . the collision damaged the Greek boat which managed to reach the nearby Greek port of kos , the merchant marine ministry said . the collision marked the third such incident between the two countries since they came to the brink of war in January over the disputed islet called Imia by Greece and Kardak by Turkey .

Japanese authorities suspect the agent used in the morning rush-hour attacks was sarin , a colorless toxic gas fatal in small doses . no one has claimed responsibility for the attacks .

'' .

Japanese prime minister Junichiro_Koizumi laid flowers early Friday at a Moscow theatre where Chechen commandos took hundreds hostage in October , ahead of meeting with his Russian counterpart Vladimir_Putin . Koizumi made a brief visit to the theatre on Dubrovka street , the site of a dramatic three-day hostage-taking that left more than 100 hostages and all 41 hostage-takers dead . the Japanese prime minister also laid flowers at the tomb of the unknown soldier outside the Kremlin walls before heading inside for talks with Putin that were set to focus on the North_Korean nuclear crisis .
Turkish president Suleyman_Demirel arrived Monday for talks with his Croatian counterpart Franjo_Tudjman , hours after cancelling plans to visit Sarajevo because of security concerns . Demirel refused to comment on the day 's events on arrival at Zagreb airport . he called off his plans to visit Sarajevo , the second time he tried to make into the city , after the Bosnian_Serbs said they could not guarantee his plane 's safety . Demirel flew instead to Zenica , in central Bosnia , to review the 1,500 Turkish peacekeepers deployed there . after his talks with Tudjman he was expected to fly home .

'' .

US presidential visits to Berlin , where thousands of American troops were once based , have come at crucial times in the past , and Bush 's comes as he tries to win support for the war on terrorism and possible military strikes on Iraq . the German capital was rocked by street clashes during the May day holiday .

Israel and Lebanon have no diplomatic relations although peace talks have continued intermittently since 1991 .

Ravasi , who holds the ecclesiastical title of monsignor , is also a member of the Pontifical_Biblical_Commission , which is charged with ensuring that sacred scriptures are interpreted properly and defended . the late pope John_Paul_II created the cultural ministry in 1998 .

Italian writer Franco_Lucentini died Monday aged 81 after throwing himself down an elevator shaft in his Turin apartment building , police said . the writer , critic and translator , was popular in Italy but was better known in english literature for his collaboration with Carlo_Fruttero on `` the truth about the mystery of Edwin_Drood '' , a critically-acclaimed adaptation of Charles_Dickens ' unfinished novel . he had been suffering from lung cancer , sources close to his family said . Lucentini was well known in Italy as a writer who worked in all genres . he not only wrote popular novels with Carlo_Fruttero , but also turned his hand to writing for theatre , film , radio and television .

Hauge 's system was to negotiate for buying clubs to pay a higher price than the selling clubs agreed , with him pocketing the difference . Eight weeks of mass street demonstrations have forced Milosevic to recognise opposition victories in Belgrade and second city , Nis , in last November 's local elections .

Neeman , a nuclear physicist and former far-right mp , said there was no link between the timing of his announcement and Israel 's general election the next day . the announcement came two weeks after a European rocket launched Israel 's first telecommunications satellite , amos , into space .

Lennart_Aspegren of Sweden has been elected a judge to the international war crimes court for Rwanda by the UN_General_Assembly , the Swedish foreign ministry said Thursday . Aspegren is one of six judges chosen from a list prepared by the UN_Security_Council . Aspegren has served as a judge in the Swedish civil , finance and justice ministries and as an appeal judge in the Swedish court of appeals . the tribunal was set up to try people accused of genocide in the civil war in Rwanda last year in which 500,000 to one million people , mainly from the tutsi minority or moderate hutus , were killed .

Pakistan 's acting president Muhammadmian_Soomro Tuesday enacted a controversial law allowing president Pervez_Musharraf to remain chief of the powerful army , information minister Sheikh_Rashid said . `` president Musharraf will now keep both the offices , '' Rashid told AFP . the bill was signed by Soomro , the chairman of the country 's senate , in the absence of Musharraf , who is visiting Latin_America as part of a six-nation tour .
Michael_Schumacher of Germany , driving a Benetton-Renault , won a rain interupted Belgium Grand_Prix here on Sunday . Damon_Hill in the Williams_Renault was second with Martin_Brundle in the ligier third . Schumacher 's victory increased his lead in the world driver 's championship to 15 points over his closest rival , Hill . more .
Fabien_Barthez ' loan deal to marseille from Manchester_United has not been authorized , football 's world governing body FIFA said on Thursday . english premiership champions Manchester_United had reached agreement with marseille for the one-year contract for France 's 1998 World_Cup winning goal keeper earlier this month but the move needed to be ratified by FIFA because it occurred outside the transfer window . Barthez had dropped down the pecking order at Old_Trafford since manager Alex_Ferguson signed American keeper Tim_Howard in the summer with Northern_Ireland 's Roy_Carroll as Howard 's deputy .
top sunni militant Abdolmalek_Rigi was at a US base 24 hours before he was arrested , Iran 's state-owned Press_TV reported on Tuesday , citing the country 's intelligence minister . Rigi , Iran 's most wanted fugitive , had been issued an Afghan passport by `` Americans , '' the minister , Heydar_Moslehi , was quoted as saying on the english - language channel . the militant had also traveled to European_Union countries and had met an unnamed NATO military chief in Afghanistan in April 2008 , according to the report .

Chiou_I-jen , secretary-general to the president , told a news conference that both Chen and Lu are in stable condition and are in a hospital in Tainan . according to Chiou , Chen has already urged the people to remain calm . the national security mechanism was activated immediately following the incident , Chiou said .

US secretary of state Hillary_Clinton decided to cut off a `` broad range '' of economic aid to Honduras over the coup that ousted president Manuel_Zelaya in June , her spokesman said Thursday . Clinton , meeting here with Zelaya , recognized `` the need for strong measures '' to overcome the de facto regime 's resistance to international efforts to end the crisis and restore democratic order , spokesman Ian_Kelly said .

Lithuanian president Valdas_Adamkus reappointed Algirdas_Brazauskas as the country 's prime minister on Wednesday , the president 's office quoted by the Baltic_News_Service said . Adamkus returned to power on Monday after winning the second round of the presidential election on June 27 , defeating former prime minister Kazimira_Prunskiene . the early election was held after the impeachement on April 6 of former president Rolandas_Paksas for violating the constitution after he had spent less than two years in office . Brazauskas was previously prime minister under Paksas .

Australian open second seed Andre_Agassi reached the men 's final on Friday when Aaron_Krickstein retired in the third set of their all - American semi-final . Agassi , who was leading 6-4 , 6-4 , 3-0 , when Krickstein retired with a leg injury , meets defending champion Pete_Sampras in Sunday 's final . the semi-final ended in total confusion when a lightning storm erupted over Flinders_Park stadium and plunged the complex into darkness . the court roof had been closed earlier because of the rain . but water poured down a slope outside the complex and flooded the basement media complex , depriving journalists of light and telephones .
Spain , Washington 's staunch ally with Britain on Iraq , will not send soldiers to take part in an imminent us-led war on Iraq , prime minister Jose_Maria_Aznar told parliament Tuesday . `` Spain will not take part in any attack or offensive missions . as as result , there will be no Spanish combat troops in the theater of operations , '' Aznar told a full session of parliament in the Spanish capital . Spain , however , `` will contribute to the international effort with a humanitarian support mission , '' he said .
US_General David_Petraeus made his public debut Saturday as commander of the war in Afghanistan , attending the celebration of US independence day at the heavily - guarded American embassy . the four-star general , who arrived in the Afghan capital Kabul on Friday , wore military fatigues as he stood in a receiving line with ambassador Karl_Eikenberry , greeting some of the 1,700 guests on the embassy lawn . Petraeus , who replaced the sacked US_General_Stanley_McChrystal , has said the near nine-year war in Afghanistan is likely to get tougher before significant improvements are seen .
Canada tightened its banking restrictions against Haiti Thursday , prohibiting all financial transactions with the Caribbean country except for humanitarian or diplomatic reasons . foreign minister Andre_Ouellet said Canada wanted to `` ensure the total isolation of the de facto regime in Haiti '' led by military strongman general Raoul_Cedras . Cedras ousted elected president Jean-Bertrand_Aristide in September 1991 and has defied demands by the international community to step down and allow the return of Aristide , currently in exile in the United_States .

'' .

Italy 's government angrily rejected on Wednesday Argentina 's own furious reaction to remarks by Italian prime minister Silvio_Berlusconi about its former military dictatorship . the reaction of Buenos_Aires was `` a slanderous attack '' on Berlusconi that was `` totally unjustified '' and had provoked Rome 's `` wrath '' , the Italian government statement said . Argentina called in Italy 's ambassador earlier Wednesday over a joke Berlusconi was said to have made about those abducted and killed during the 1976-1983 military dictatorship , an Argentine diplomatic source said .

Sweden 's main opposition Moderate_Party got a new leader Saturday , when Fredrik_Reinfeldt was elected to steer the party to the next legislative elections due by 2006 , according to the party 's website . Reinfeldt replaces Bo_Lundgren at the helm of the conservative party , whose stated aim is now to oust the Social_Democrats led by prime minister Goeran_Persson . Lundgren announced in April that he intended to step down after the party 's poor showing in the 2002 vote , when the conservatives scored just over 15 percent of the vote , compared to nearly 23 percent of the ballot in 1998 .
a veteran Hong_Kong reporter jailed in China for espionage activities has been freed , local radio station RTHK reported on its website . Ching_Cheong , 58 , chief China correspondent for Singapore 's The_Straits_Times , was arrested in April 2005 . the following year he was sentenced to five years in jail , accused of spying for Taiwan . Hong_Kong government sources quoted by RTHK said Ching would soon return to his home in the southern Chinese territory . Ching 's conviction followed a one-day , closed-door trial . an appeal was later dismissed . the journalist had always maintained his innocence .

'' .

Yang_Liwei , China 's first man in space , is scheduled to meet United_Nations secretary general Kofi_Annan and present him with two un flags that were on board his spacecraft during his historic flight , state media said Tuesday . Yang has left for the United_States as part of a delegation of representatives from China 's first manned space mission , according to xinhua news agency , which did not say when exactly they would meet Annan . Yang orbited the earth 14 times in October last year , putting China alongside the United_States and the former Soviet_Union as the only countries in the world to send a man into space .

Leonel_Brizola , a prominent Brazilian left-wing political leader with close ties to the labor movement , died Monday after suffering cardiac arrest at a local hospital , his party announced . he was 82 . the Democratic_Labor_Party said in a statement Brizola had been treated at the hospital for a severe flu he had contracted during a recent trip to Uruguay . his heart stopped during the night . Brizola lived in exile in Uruguay during long years of military rule in Brazil and returned to his native country only in 1979 . after founding his party in 1980 , he was twice elected governor of Rio_de_Janeiro_state . he also ran for president in 1989 and 1994 .

Obama had vowed during his first week in office last January that he would close the prison camp within one year , but now concedes that it will take more time .

Tehran , an arch-enemy of Israel , has slammed the pact as `` unacceptable . '' .

Juan_Carlos iriate , 36 , was detained in the town of Hendaya near the Spanish border , the agency said citing sources from ETA prisoners support group askatasuna . iriate is wanted in Spain for the crime of membership in an armed group . ETA has killed more than 800 people in four decades of armed struggle for independence of basque territories which they say include parts of northern Spain and southwest France .

Scelli 's remarks sparked a political storm in Italy with calls from the opposition for a detailed explanation from the government .
Ukraine 's parliament on Thursday sacked interior minister Yuriy_Lutsenko , adding to tensions just over one week before the final round of presidential polls . the Verkhovna_Rada adopted a bill relieving Lutsenko of his duties , the lower house of parliament said in a statement on its website . according to the Interfax-Ukraine news agency , 231 deputies voted for his removal . it said that of these 171 were from the Regions_Party of Viktor_Yanukovich , who will challenge prime minister Yulia_Tymoshenko in a run-off of presidential polls on February 7 . however only one deputy from the prime minister 's Bloc_Yulia Tymoshenko -lrb- byut -rrb- voted for his removal .
Israel will no longer qualify for low duties on its exports to the United_States under special trade benefits intended for developing countries , the White_House said Friday . an order by president Bill_Clinton said Israeli per capita gross national product now exceeds the limit set under US law for the so - called generalized system of preferences . The_Bahamas was also removed from the list under the GSP , which provides lower tariffs for goods imported from eligible countries .
Polish prime minister Leszek_Miller left office on Sunday after president Aleksander_Kwasniewski formally accepted his resignation . `` i resign from my post and i resign from my government , '' Miller said . `` the main goal of my government was European_Union membership and this goal has been achieved . Chinese authorities need to authorize more generous returns on investment if they want to continue to attract private investors in the Chinese infrastructure , World_Bank president Lewis_Preston said Saturday . Preston told a press conference here on the occasion of the annual World_Bank assembly that if the Chinese want to attract private capital on the level of other east Asian countries , they need to modify their current policies . China limits investment returns so as to moderate the overheating of its economy . developing countries , notably in Asia and Latin_America , are turning more and more to private capital to finance infrastructural projects .

Ople was on a flight from Tokyo to Bangkok when he became critically ill , forcing the plane to be diverted to Taiwan , where he died following emergency treatment .

Jean-Louis_Becker , 46 , was held for questioning after being arrested in north-western France on the strength of an international arrest warrant . the warrant was issued after British police found a French identity card in his name during an anti-terrorist raid in London on July 15 , arresting seven people and claiming they had narrowly foiled an IRA bomb attack . Becker 's identity card had been falsified . the picture of one of the arrested men , robert ewin morrow , had been affixed to it .

Canada last May confirmed a case of mad cow disease in Alberta . BSE is a brain-wasting illness linked to the fatal variant creutzfeldt-jakob disease -lrb- vcjd -rrb- in humans .

a fishermen was killed by a shark while checking his nets in the northern Philippines , police said Friday . Bacud 's son summoned other fishermen to help but when they pulled Bacud from the water , he was already dead with shark bites on his right rib cage and chest , Corpuz said . the police chief did not know what type of shark attacked Bacud and said no one in the town could recall a similar attack in waters off Paoay .

The_European_Union 's executive commission said Friday it had conditionally approved a bid by the US food company Mars to acquire the French pet food concern Royal_Canin . Mars agreed to divest itself of five brand-name products that it would acquire in the deal as well as two production facilities in France . Royal_Canin currently has about one third of the pet food market in France and the asset sales required by the commission were necessary to ensure that it did not become the dominant player in the sector . thanks to its acquisition by Mars , the company hopes to become the leading pet food supplier in the United_States and to boost its sales with veterinarians .
Chile and India in August will begin negotiating a limited free trade treaty destined to double trade between the countries , a Chilean official said Wednesday . Osvaldo_Rosales , director general for international economic relations in the Chilean_Foreign_Ministry , said the accord would be partial because it would cover only part of the exchange of goods between the two countries . he said the treaty would allow `` a substantive reduction in tariffs '' and reduced transportation costs . Chilean and Indian trade delegations will begin negotiating the treaty in Santiago in the third week of August , said Rosales .

Pope_John-Paul_II made Sladekevicius a cardinal in 1988 in recognition of his long resistance to Soviet rule in Lithuania which led him to face trial , imprisonment and internal exile . Sladekevicius offered his resignation last year for health reasons but the pope refused it , keeping him a further year in his post as a sign of his esteem .

Thirteen people , including a retired Colombian policeman , were arrested in a drugs bust that netted 570 kilograms of cocaine in Spain , authorities said Sunday . suspects from Spain , Colombia , Mexico and Italy were seized in the raids in rubi and barcelona in the northeast and Malaga in the south after a seven-month operation , Spanish police said in a statement . among them was the Colombian officer `` who was responsible for security at Bogota airport when he was on active service . '' those detained included the main heads of a trafficking ring bringing cocaine from South_America hidden in deliveries of building materials , it said .
China and Greece have signed an accord to cooperate against crime , the official Xinhua_News_Agency reported Thursday . the agreement , calling for stronger cooperation between their police forces , was signed by Chinese minister of Public_Security_Tao_Siju and visiting Greek minister of public order Stelios_Papathemelis .
Ian_Wright and Dutch signing Dennis_Bergkamp guided arsenal to a comfortable 2-0 victory over Swedish first division side GAIS here on Tuesday night . Wright opened the scoring in the fourth minute with a powerful header from Nigel_Winterburns cross , but Bergkamp needed help from a fumbling goalkeeper as he nodded in his effort in the 44th .
Malaysia on Friday welcomed the landslide victory of the Labour_Party in the British elections . `` we welcome the decision of the British public , '' deputy prime minister Anwar_Ibrahim told journalists . `` we congratulate Tony_Blair as the new prime minister . we believe that it will be the continuation of excellent bilateral relations between Malaysia and the UK , '' he said . Anwar added that Malaysian prime minister Mahathir_Mohamad , currently on an African tour , would look forward to `` an early meeting with prime minister Tony_Blair . '' .
Canadian racer David_Anderson , 22 , was taken to hospital at Salt_Lake_City on Friday following a fall in training for Sunday 's super-g . Anderson , who hails from British_Colombia , was initially thought to be seriously hurt but hospital spokesman Jesse_Gomez said his condition was satisfactory . `` we have upgraded his condition from serious to satisfactory . there are no fractures , only soft tissue injuries , '' said Gomez . `` there is possible slight concussion but he is conscious and talking , '' added Gomez , who said it was likely Anderson would remain in hospital for overnight observation . Anderson finished 38th in the downhill last Sunday .

'' `` the extent of the fraud is proportional to the violent reaction , '' he said , adding he was `` worried about the situation in Iran . '' .
the Palestinians are hoping that Israel will elect a `` leadership capable of building peace '' in February polls announced by hardline prime minister Ariel_Sharon Tuesday , chief Palestinian negotiator Saeb_Erakat said . `` i hope the Israeli people will choose a leadership capable of building peace because the Israeli people deserve a better leadership than the current one , '' Erakat said . `` a leadership which will work for peace and not for war and bloodshed , '' he added . the Israeli elections are expected to be held on February 4 , two weeks after the Palestinians are themselves due to go to the polls in presidential and parliamentary elections .
the caledonian union -lrb- uc -rrb- , a mainly moderate member of the independantist kanak nationalist socialist liberation -lrb- FLNKS -rrb- , elected a new president Sunday . Bernard_Lepeu was chosen during the party 's 27th congress to succeed Francois_Burck , who received 22 votes against Lepeu 's 164 . Burck was elected to the post in 1989 , replacing Jean-Marie tjibaou , also president of FLNKS , who had been assassinated . Lepeu , 53 , from the wagap tribe in poindimie , on the eastern coast of the territroy , is a catholic school governor and a teacher . since 1995 he has been director of the cabinet of Leopold_Joredie , northern provincial president of FLNKS .

a Polish woman has filed a lawsuit in Berlin claiming damages from Germany for her father 's suffering at the Auschwitz_Nazi concentration camp , a legal first , her lawyer told AFP on Thursday . Izabella_Brodacka is seeking 6,000 euros -lrb- 7,300 dollars -rrb- from the government in Berlin , said her lawyer Stefan_Hambura , but he was not able to say when a decision was expected . Brodacka 's father , who is not jewish and died in 1994 aged 83 , was held in the concentration camp in southern Poland from September 22 , 1940 to March 4 , 1942 under the nazi dictatorship of Adolf_Hitler .

Burundi 's new leader Pierre_Buyoya on Friday urged foreign powers to refrain from military intervention in his country , a day after he seized power in an army-backed coup . Buyoya , a tutsi military official , was speaking at his first press conference since he ousted former president Sylvestre_Ntibantunganya as leader of Burundi , which has been ravaged by three years of ethnic fighting . `` i never believed that this ethnic conflict would be resolved by foreign intervention . this is in no way a solution . '' the coup has triggered international outrage , condemned by the United_Nations and the United_States , whose ambassador in Bujumbura is sheltering Ntibantunganya .

Russia has said it sees no need for a new resolution and will block any measure that would trigger military action .

Tulafono said on local television the governor 's death was unrelated to his hospitalization but due to something that happened during the flight . Sunia , 61 , had been governor for seven years .

Russia has authorised the use of its airspace for the transit of US troops and arms to Afghanistan , according to an agreement announced Monday during US president Barack_Obama 's visit to Moscow . the deal permits up to 4,500 military flights per year , or about 12 per day , which can be loaded with troops , firearms , ammunition , military vehicles and spare parts , a senior US official said . the official said the military flights would not be charged air navigation fees and that they would not stop on Russian territory . previously Russia had only allowed the United_States to ship non-lethal military supplies across its territory by train .

the OPEC oil cartel appointed Venezuelan_Energy minister Alvaro_Silva caldaron as its new secretary general on Wednesday , it said in a statement . Silva , who will succeed his compatriot Ali_Rodriguez , will take up the post from July 1 this year and hold it until December 31 , 2003 , said the statement issued after a meeting of OPEC ministers in Vienna . Rodriguez announced his resignation in April after being appointed to head the state-run oil company in his native Venezuela , following an aborted coup there .

Perry had previously offered to testify before the Russian parliament , but in a speech to a lawyers group in Orlando , Florida he confirmed that he planned to do so . `` i am scheduled to meet with the duma to testify in support of the Russian_Duma ratifying this treaty next month , '' he said . `` i am optimistic that the Russian_Duma will ratify that treaty . '' start ii , which has been ratified by the US_Congress , would slash the strategic nuclear arsenals of the United_States and Russia to about a quarter of their cold war peak .

Howard 's limousine arrived at Jeffery 's official residence around 11.35 am -lrb- 0135 gmt -rrb- . a press conference was scheduled for 12.30 pm . among the waiting reporters was a sole anti-war protester dressed in black with a placard . as the queen 's representative , Jeffery is responsible for dissolving parliament ahead of an election .

Israel has banned Palestinian leader Yasser_Arafat from leaving the West_Bank town of Ramallah after its decision to cut all contacts with the Palestinian leader , an Israeli cabinet minister said on Thursday . `` Israel will not attack him personally but he -lrb- Arafat -rrb- will stay where he is , '' justice minister Meir_Sheetrit told Israeli military radio hours after the cabinet decision was endorsed following a bus ambush that killed 10 Israelis .
Taiwan on Monday greatly eased restrictions on imports of Chinese products and visits by professionals , as a demonstration of its intention to improve strained relations with China , a top official said . state enterprises are to be be allowed to freely ship in mainland products , said Kao_Koong-lian , vice chairman of Mainland_Affairs_Council -lrb- MAC -rrb- . private firms already enjoy the privilege . however , only those products permitted by the government to be imported should be shipped in , Kao said . Taiwan currently allows around 3,000 Chinese items to be imported via a third area .

all countries that signed the European_Union 's Maastricht_Treaty have `` exactly the same right '' to join in monetary union at the outset , as long as they meet the convergence criteria , French president Jacques_Chirac said on Monday . he told correspondents that with respect to economic and monetary union -lrb- EMU -rrb- , participation must be decided `` solely on the basis of the letter of the treaty '' . he was speaking after a meeting with Portuguese prime minister Antonio_Gutteres , and with respect to Portugal 's participation in EMU , Chirac said `` if it wants to take part , it can do so without any doubt '' . the only condition is , naturally , having to meet the convergence criteria , he said .

chancellor Helmut_Kohl of Germany has urged US president Bill_Clinton to take measures to halt the slide of the dollar . in an interview on German ARD television Thursday night , Kohl said current US fiscal and monetary policies were `` unacceptable '' and that the US should bring its budget deficit under control . despite a rise against major currencies on Thursday , the dollar has remained weak and traders were doubtful its recovery would last . longer-term prospects for the dollar remained poor , with one analyst predicting that the US currency could slip to 70 yen and 1.25 marks by the end of the year .

Lithuanian president Rolandas_Paksas has postponed a planned official visit to the United_States , his office said on Thursday . the announcement came the day after members of parliament launched a bid to impeach Paksas over allegations that he has ties to the Russian mafia . Four parliamentary parties , including the two in the governing majority , started drafting a formal impeachment text to present to deputies , after the assembly adopted a report detailing the shady links . Paksas 's office said the president had announced the postponement of his US trip after meeting with the United_States ambassador to his country , Stephen_Mull .
us-born chess legend Bobby_Fischer has died in Iceland at the age of 64 , his close friend Gardar_Sverrisson told AFP on Friday . `` i can confirm that he died yesterday in his home due to an illness , '' Sverrisson said . Fischer , who made world headlines by defeating Soviet world champion Boris_Spassky in a cold war chess showdown in Reykjavik in 1972 , took Icelandic citizenship in 2005 to avoid being deported to the United_States . he was wanted for breaking international sanctions by playing a chess match in Yugoslavia in 1992 .

Bouteflika last visited Germany in April 2001 .

Sharon dimissed Blumenthal after she refused to answer police questions about whether she had paid hotel bills for Likud_central_committee members in return for their vote to secure her a high place on the party 's list of parliamentary candidates .

Estonia is one of 10 countries seeking to finalise EU membership talks in just over two weeks time in order to join the bloc in 2004 and last week received an invitation to join NATO .
a US appeals court confirmed Monday a life sentence handed down on Zacarias_Moussaoui , a French national , for complicity in the September 11 , 2001 attacks on the United_States . the ruling upheld a sentence passed by a federal court in Virginia in May 2006 after Moussaoui pleaded guilty to conspiracy in the hijackings of the airliners used in the attacks in New_York and Washington . Moussaoui , who later recanted his testimony only to claim he was part of another Al-Qaeda plot , is serving a life sentence at a maximum security prison in Colorado .
German chancellor Angela_Merkel on Sunday called for an `` immediate and unconditional ceasefire '' in Georgia , in a telephone call with French president Nicolas_Sarkozy , a spokesman said . she also called for the withdrawal of all military forces `` to their positions before the outbreak of hostilities '' and said Russian air attacks on Georgian territory must be stopped `` without delay '' . Merkel spoke to Sarkozy -- whose nation holds the rotating EU presidency -- ahead of an emergency meeting of EU foreign ministers in Brussels on Wednesday to discuss the bloc 's response to the conflict in the Caucasus .

Jego spoke as demonstrations broke out in France 's Indian_Ocean island of mayotte against the presence of Bacar who fled there after a force of Comoran and African_Union troops invaded Anjouan to depose him .

the earliest known portrait of the third US president , Thomas_Jefferson , valued at half a million dollars , has been stolen from a studio here . the 1786 portrait of one of the founding fathers of the United_States had been sent to a studio here for reproduction , police said . it was owned by Charles_Adams , a sixth-generation descendent of John_Adams , the second US president after George_Washington . the painting was by the popular 18th century artist Mather_Brown and has been insured for 500,000 dollars . but according to Jefferson experts , the portrait looks nothing like him .

Iranian Central_Bank president Mohsen_Nourbakhsh , a prominent figure in Iran 's economic affairs , died overnight of a heart attack , state news agency IRNA reported Sunday . IRNA gave no more details . Nourbakhsh , 55 , was economic affairs minister during the 1989-97 presidency of Akbar_Hashemi_Rafsanjani , and was three times head of the central bank , from 1981 to 1986 , 1994 to 1995 and from 1999 until his death . during his last term he unified the various exchange rates of the riyal .

Kenyon believes a deal will be agreed and he told The_Sun : `` Michael has played a great part for chelsea and there is no reason for us not to exercise that option . '' .

rival Ivory_Coast leaders on Monday started dismantling a buffer zone that has divided the West_African country for four years since a failed coup sparked a civil war . arch-rivals turned partners-in-government , president Laurent_Gbagbo and prime minister Guillaume_Soro presided over ceremonies for the landmark event , enshrined in the country 's un-backed peace process . the buffer zone has been patrolled by un peacekeepers to separate Soro 's rebels in the north of the country and Gbagbo 's government forces in the south . The_United_Nations created the so-called `` confidence zone '' in 2002 to end a brief civil war after a failed coup attempt by Soro to topple Gbagbo .

Thailand 's plans to host the 1998 Asian_Games are under threat after the government failed Tuesday to reach agreement on a sports complex , accommodation and a rapid-transit link meant to be built for the Games . the Olympic_Council_of_Asia -lrb- OCA -rrb- has made growing noises in recent months that Bangkok risks losing the event unless a start is made on multi-million dollar preparations and next month an OCA mission is to visit the Thai capital to check on progress . Thai officials have already been warned by OCA president Sheikh_Ahmad Al fahad Al_Sabah that the Games might be moved unless construction began immediately .

Europe is ready to work with Ukraine 's new pro-russian president Viktor_Yanukovich , EU foreign affairs chief Catherine_Ashton said on Monday , praising the `` calm atmosphere '' of the vote . `` The_European_Union remains committed to deepening the relationship with Ukraine and supporting it in implementing its reform agenda . it looks forward to working with the new president to this end , '' Ashton said in a statement . in Sunday 's run-off election , Ukraine 's voters narrowly chose Yanukovich as president , rejecting the west-leaning policies of the Orange_Revolution .
Jordan on Thursday granted political asylum to Iraq 's former minister of industry and minerals and members of his family , a Jordanian official said . Hussein_Kamel_Hassan has been sacked from his post as minister and head of Iraq 's military industrialisation organisation , the official Iraqi news agency INA reported minutes earlier from Baghdad . Hassan is a son-in-law of Iraqi president Saddam_Hussein and a former defence minister . a presidential decree ordering his dismissal was issued Wednesday in Baghdad and announced Thursday , INA said .
Mexico on Monday arrested a US citizen accused of 46 sexual assaults in his homeland , and deported him , federal prosecutors said . Musolino was arrested in July in the United_States on sex charges but paid a 300,000 dollar bond and was set free , the prosecutors ' office said . he was deported at midday and was to be arrested on his return to the United_States , the office added .

Rehn , 58 , a swedish-speaking finn who represents the tiny Swedish_Party , has been a member of parliament since 1979 . she is currently in the running for the presidency of UNICEF , the United_Nations_Childrens_Fund .

Japan is to lift a ban on tomato imports from the United_States early this year following pressure from Washington , the Nihon_Keizai_Shimbun said Friday . the agriculture , forestry and fisheries ministry had already informed domestic tomato growers of the move , the business daily said , quoting ministry officials . Tokyo had long claimed that American tomatoes might carry harmful mold , but recently revoked the claim as the US government pressed its demand for a lifting of the ban , the daily said . Japan imports several million tonnes of tomatoes a year from a limited number of countries such as Canada , the Netherlands and South_Korea .

Ukrainian president Leonid_Kuchma is to visit Turkmenistan Thursday in a bid to secure a freezing of Kiev 's gas debt with Ashkhabad , the ITAR-TASS agency said here Tuesday . Kuchma will call on his Turkmenistan counterpart Saparmurad_Niyazov to freeze the debt , which currently stands at around 800 million dollars . Turkmenistan , which has provided Ukraine with around a quarter of its gas , cut off supplies at the start of 1994 due to the outstanding payments . Kiev , enmeshed in a grave economic crisis , also owes Moscow more than one billion dollars for gas deliveries .

a judge in Argentina on Monday blocked Latin_America 's first planned gay marriage , scheduled for Tuesday , a court source said . an Argentine judge had paved the way for the region 's first gay marriage earlier this month when she granted Alejandro_Freyre and his partner Jose_Maria_Di_Bello permission to marry . Buenos_Aires , known for its active if low-key gay movement , became the region 's first city to approve civil unions for gay couples in 2002 , granting gay couples some but not all the rights enjoyed by heterosexual married couples . Freyre and Di_Bello had been denied in an earlier attempt to marry because they were both men , prompting them to file a successful appeal .

a nuclear plant under construction in Iran with Russia 's help is for peaceful purposes , Iranian foreign minister Ali_Akbar_Velayati told a Qatari newspaper Saturday . Iran `` seeks peaceful benefits '' from the plant located in southern Iran . Moscow on Thursday announced that Russian technicians have started working on the Bushehr plant , and denied that the reactor could have military uses .

British_Foreign secretary Jack_Straw said Wednesday the un nuclear watchdog agency 's resolution on Iranian atomic activities was an `` important step forward '' in preventing nuclear proliferation . he said the resolution , adopted by consensus among the board of governors of the International_Atomic_Energy_Agency , opened the way to continued cooperation with Iran . `` i welcome this resolution , '' Straw said . `` it is an important step forward in the international community 's efforts to prevent the proliferation of nuclear weapons . '' the resolution condemned Iran for nearly 20 years of covert nuclear operations but did not recommend that Tehran should face un sanctions .

US_Defense secretary Donald_Rumsfeld said Sunday he would back giving Saddam_Hussein and other top Iraqi leaders immunity from possible war crimes charges if they would step down and accept exile to avert a us-led war . `` to avoid a war i would personally recommend that some provision be made so that the senior leadership and their families could be provided haven in some other country , '' Rumsfeld said on ABC television 's `` this week '' program . `` i think that that would be a fair trade to avoid a war . '' Rumsfeld was responding to a question about whether the United_States would support reported Arab initiatives aimed at convincing Saddam to leave power voluntarily .

Ukraine has paid Russia for natural gas it consumed in September , Ukrainian energy company naftogaz said Tuesday . `` we paid for the gas in full and on time , '' naftogaz spokesman Valentyn_Zemlyansky said as quoted by the RIA_Novosti_news_agency . Ukraine paid some 400 million dollars for some two billion cubic meters of Russian natural gas consumed in September , Zemlyansky said . Russian gas supplies were cut off to much of Europe in January as part of a bitter dispute over payments and prices between Russia and Ukraine .

The_Philippines peso dived to an all-time low Thursday after a popular movie star , Fernando_Poe , announced he would challenge president Gloria_Arroyo in elections in May nexy year . the peso opened at 55.85 against the dollar , eclipsing the previous record low of 55.750 registered on January 17 , 2001 , a few days before a military-backed popular revolt toppled the presidency of another Filipino movie star , Joseph_Estrada . Poe 's popularity is seen as a potential threat to Arroyo , who is seeking a full six-year term after replacing the deposed Estrada in January 2001 .
a South_Korean tourist was killed and six others were injured Tuesday in a freak motorboat accident in the central Philippines , officials said . Kim_Jin ja and six other South_Koreans were aboard the vessel on their way to a floating restaurant off Olango island , near the central island of Cebu , when strong waves battered the boat . the boat crashed into a submerged rock and capsized . Kim drowned while her companions were plucked out of the water by a passing air force helicopter , officials said . the Filipino boat operator was unharmed .

Russia on Wednesday gave a cautious welcome to NATO 's offer to release it from some of its obligations under the conventional forces in Europe -lrb- CFE -rrb- arms control treaty . `` at first sight it is something that goes in the right direction but not something that will fully satisfy our requirements , '' Russia 's ambassador in Brussels , Vitaly_Churkin said after a meeting with NATO ambassadors here . Churkin said he was optimistic about the chances of the remaining differences being bridged in detailed negotiations . reform of the CFE , signed during the cold war , was a key Russian condition for accepting NATO 's planned enlargement into eastern Europe .

Richard has performed a number of similar stunts in order to raise money for a charity helping children with nevus , a skin-blemishing condition that can result in cancer .

'' Chagonda said he did not know why charges had been dropped against Ncube , who was arrested Monday and charged with urging MDC supporters to rise up against the government after the opposition party called for a week of protests against president Robert_Mugabe 's regime .

the latest US draft resolution demanding that Iraq disarm or face serious consequences has taken some of Russia 's views into account , a top minister said Wednesday in remarks that were Moscow 's first reaction to the un draft . the new US resolution `` has taken certain additional steps that take Russia 's position into account , '' deputy foreign minister Yury_Fedotov was quoted as saying by ITAR-TASS_news_agency . at the same time , the Russian foreign ministry `` is continuing to carefully study the new US document , '' Fedotov said .
Indonesian president Megawati_Sukarnoputri is expected to visit Bangladesh next month , a foreign ministry spokesman said Thursday . he told reporters Megawati 's itinerary was `` being worked out '' and did not give an exact date . however , Bangladeshi newspapers , quoting diplomatic sources , said Megawati would visit for three days from June 18 . Indonesia and Bangladesh are the world 's first and third largest Muslim-majority countries respectively . Megawati last visited Bangladesh in 2001 when she was Indonesia 's vice president .

Klestil spent a few days in hospital after a lung infection three weeks ago . a statement from his office said Klestil had probably resumed official duties too quickly , and was now suffering from a slight inflammation of the heart area that did not require admission into hospital . Klestil met last week with visiting Algerian president Abdelaziz_Bouteflika .

China 's Zou_Shiming successfully defended his light-flyweight title at the Asian_Games on Friday , coming from a point down to beat Kazakhstan 's Birzhan_Zhakypov 9-5 . the lightning-quick Zou , the reigning olympic champion , was a point down after a lively first round which saw the Kazakh on the backfoot for most of the bout . but two-time world champion Zou made the pressure tell in the second , picking off Zhakypov time and again to go to the bell 5-1 in the lead , holding off a brave final round from the challenger to take gold in style .

Japan has cancelled a 2.6 million dollar -lrb- 2.9 million euro -rrb- debt it is owed by Tanzania as part of its efforts to support the east African country 's poverty reduction programme , officials said . an agreement to have the debt wiped out was signed in Dar_es_Salaam on Monday between the Japanese ambassador Keitaro_Sato and the permanent secretary in Tanzania 's finance ministry Peter_Ngumbullu , according to an official statement . `` Japan is committed to helping Tanzania realise her poverty reduction objectives because the country is now expected to direct more funds to social services instead of debt servicing , '' Sato was quoted as saying .

Solzhenitsyn was not fazed by the lift breakdown , according to an AFP photographer present . he used the time to question the hospital 's director about working conditions , jotting down her replies in a little notebook .

Gordon , 52 , replaces the Dutch general Patrick_Cammaert and is expected to take up his now post at the end of October , when Cammaert 's mandate expires . there are some 4,200 un troops and observers in UNMEE , which was set up to monitor a ceasefire signed in 2000 by Ethiopia and Eritrea after a two-year border war .

Protopapas did not indicate their number . no media has yet heeded the Greek government 's advice . Greece advised its citizens to leave Iraq on Monday and closed its Baghdad embassy on Tuesday .

'' Bonomy replied : `` i shall enter pleas of not guilty on your behalf '' to each of the 11 counts .

James , a salsa teacher in civilian life , was convicted by a jury at the Central_Criminal_Court , or Old_Bailey , of sending coded emails to the Iranian military attache in Kabul . he had denied charges of breaching the official secrets act and wilful misconduct in public office .
Salvadoran president Armando_Calderon will travel to Taiwan later this month for an official visit during which he will have several meetings with President_Lee teng-hui , the Salvadoran Foreign_Ministry said here Thursday . the ministry said the visit aimed at taking stock of political and trade relations between the two countries . the ministry said the visit would take place August 25-30 . Calderon will be accompanied by a large delegation of government and business officials .
