Two convicted traitors were Friday sentenced to life imprisonment for their role in the 2000 coup in Fiji . High_Court justice Andrew_Wilson sentenced Jo_Nata and Timoci_Silotolu after a year-long trial . Wilson told Silotolu he must serve a minimum nine years and Nata a minimum seven years .
Japan 's prime minister Ryutaro_Hashimoto on Wednesday welcomed the re - election of US president Bill_Clinton , hoping that it would help ease areas of mutual concern such as Okinawa . `` i would like to congratulate him , and hope for further progress in the japan-us relationship , '' he was quoted as telling reporters at his official residence , adding that he hoped to telephone Clinton as early as Friday . `` i hope to promote cooperation in areas of concern such as Okinawa , '' Hashimoto reportedly said , referring to the southern Japanese island whose residents widely oppose the US military presence there .
a meeting between Polish and Czech presidents Aleksander_Kwasniewski and Vaclav_Havel will be delayed to allow the Czech head of state time to convalece following an operation , a presidential spokesman said Monday . the meeting , which will be the first between the two leaders since Kwasniewski 's election last year , had been scheduled to take place on February 22 but will instead take place next month , the spokesman said , without specifying a new date . he said Havel , who last week underwent an operation to remove a polyp from his mouth , needs two more weeks to convalece . the meeting is expected to take place in the Czech border town of Nachod .

Bouty , a former lawyer who was struck off for accepting bribes , is the ex-girlfriend of Jean-Michel_Nihoul , a Brussels advocate who has been in custody since August 16 and is thought to have been one of Dutroux 's leading accomplices .

'' several broadcasters showed the minister -- who triggered a political storm by appearing to be drunk and slurring his words at a g7 meeting in Rome -- walking into Aso 's office , followed by a group of reporters .

a California judge Wednesday ordered a Canadian woman to be held without bail on charges she ran a babyselling ring that lured pregnant hungarians to the United_States . federal judge Elgin_Edwards refused bail for hungarian-born Marianne_Gati , 48 , who was arrested Friday after a joint us-hungarian police investigation . Gati allegedly would tell Hungarian women to lie to US immigration officials about their pregnancies so they could give birth here and sell their newborn children , at prices up to 80,000 dollars . she has denied the charges . according to the prosecution , Gati began her operation in 1994 and has pocketed about 20,000 dollars for each transaction .

Cantona requested on Tuesday to be released from his contract after the Football_Association investigated his appearance in a pre-season friendly training match . Cantona , who is back in France , is currently serving a ban from all football until September 30 for attacking a Crystal_Palace fan after being sent off in a match in January .
French president Jacques_Chirac said here Tuesday that he did not rule out France contributing to a peace force in Haiti to quell civil unrest on the Caribbean_island . Chirac , on a two-day visit to Hungary , also called for negotiations to end the crisis which he said had been `` handled disastrously for so long . '' the insurrection that erupted in Haiti in early February has so far left at least 70 people dead and several hundreds wounded .
German bank BHF-Bank announced on Wednesday that ernst Michel_Kruse would succeed Wolfgang_Strutz as bank chairman , as of May 13 this year . The_Bank said Kruse , 53 , has been deputy chairman of Chase_Manhattan_Corporation , but would be appointed to the bank directorate as of February 1 , becoming chairman in May . he will succeed current chairman Strutz , 63 , who asked to leave for health reasons .
Canadian foreign minister Andre_Ouellet will pay a four-day visit to Japan next week for talks with Japanese leaders , the foreign ministry said Thursday . Ouellet , who will arrive here Monday , will meet prime minister Tomiichi_Murayama , foreign minister Yohei_Kono , minister of International_Trade_and_Industry Ryutaro_Hashimoto and the director general of the Defense_Agency , tokuichiro tamazawa . after his visit to Japan , the Canadian minister will fly to Bangkok to attend a ministerial meeting of the association of of Southeast_Asian_Nations .
Guyana president Cheddi_Jagan will visit Ottawa this Thursday and Friday , Canadian prime minister Jean_Chretien announced Monday . Jagan is scheduled to have talks with Chretien , International_Trade minister Art_Eggleton and minister for International_Cooperation Pierre_Pettigrew .
The_House_of_Representatives Wednesday passsed a bill strengthening the US economic embargo on Cuba , the same measure approved a day earlier by the senate . the vote was 336 to 86 with one abstention . president Bill_Clinton has promised to sign the bill . Clinton dropped his opposition to the draft legislaiton after Cuba shot down two US civil aircraft February 24 . the bill includes controversial provisions aimed at punishing foreigners who invest in Cuban properties confiscated under the regime of Cuban president Fidel_Castro .
Yugoslav president Zoran_Lilic will pay his first official visit to Romania October 21-22 , a spokeman for the Romanian foreign ministry announced here Wednesday . Lilic will hold talks with Romanian president Ion_Iliescu centered around the war in former Yugoslavia , Foreign_Ministry spokesman Mircea_Geoana said . not on the agenda is the signing of a bilateral treaty which is still being negotiated , Geoana said .
former vice president Al_Gore , who lost the White_House to president George_W._Bush in the 2000 election , is planning to endorse Howard_Dean as the democratic nominee to challenge Bush next year , US_media reported Monday . Gore is to announce his decision in a speech in New_York Tuesday , according to media reports quoting anonymous sources close to Gore . a Dean spokesman refused comment when asked about the endorsement . Gore 's endorsement is expected to boost the candidacy of Dean , a former governor of Vermont , and could hurt that of senator Joseph_Lieberman , Gore 's running mate in 2000 .
top French actress Marie_Trintignant was in a coma on Monday after after receiving a severe beating in a Lithuanian hotel , Vilnius police said Monday . Trintignant , 41 , underwent complicated neurosurgery in hospital after the incident , which police said allegedly involved a friend . Danguole_Kaladiene , head intensive care at Vilnius_University hospital refused to comment on Trintignant 's condition . `` her relatives asked us not to release any information to the media '' , Kaladiene told AFP .
Chechen warlord Salman_Raduyev said Wednesday that he organised a failed bomb attack on a railway station in southern Russia last week , according to Russian television . Raduyev , who was declared dead in March , reappeared in public last Thursday to claim responsibility for two bombs on Moscow trolleybuses earlier this month in which 30 people were injured . the bomb in Voronezh on Friday failed to explode , although a detonator went off . `` i claim responsibility for the failed Voronezh attack , '' Raduyev said at a news conference somewhere in southern Chechnya , according to pictures carried by ORT television .
Iraqi foreign minister Hoshyar_Zebari is due to visit Sudan during early September , his sudanese counterpart Mustafa_Osman_Ismail , said on Wednesday . Ismail , quoted by the official Sudan_News_Agency , gave no details on the purpose of the visit except to say that discussions would focus on Iraq and other Arab issues . it will be Zebari 's first visit to Sudan as foreign minister and signals the opening of a new chapter in relations between the two countries . Sudan was among the staunchest supporters of former Iraqi dictator , Saddam_Hussein , after his invasion of neighboring Kuwait in 1990 .

Arafat , 75 , was flown into Amman on a Jordanian military helicopter from his West_Bank headquarters in Ramallah , which he left for the first time in almost three years .
Bavarian prime minister Edmund_Stoiber is to visit Thailand from April 9-11 , the German_Embassy announced . Stoiber , who heads the largest of Germany 's 16 federal states , will meet Thai prime minister Chuan_Leekpai and foreign minister Krasae_Chanawongse , the embassy said . Stoiber will be accompanied by members of his government and several leading representatives of the Bavarian private sector . Bavaria is the seat of several major German companies , including BMW , audi and Siemens_AG .

Raczko , an economist specialising in European integration , was deputy finance minister in Miller 's government in 2001 and 2002 . the prime minister also told reporters he was handing responsibility for coordinating the government 's economic policy to economy , labour and Social_Affairs minister Jerzy_Hausner , who he promoted to the rank of deputy prime minister . as well as finance minister , Kolodko had also been a deputy prime minister .

Montazeri was once the designated successor to Iran 's islamic revolutionary leader , Ayatollah_Ruhollah_Khomeini , but fell from grace and was then placed under house arrest for five years in the central holy city of Qom . an outspoken critic of the regime , he was freed from house arrest earlier this year .

Japan and Mexico agreed Sunday to launch negotiations for a free trade pact . Japanese prime minister Junichiro_Koizumi and Mexican president Vicente_Fox struck the agreement on the sidelines of an Asia-Pacific_Economic_Cooperation -lrb- APEC -rrb- summit at a resort on the shores of the pacific . `` the two leaders decided to launch negotiations to conclude a bilateral agreement , including the elements of a free trade agreement , to strengthen the bilateral economic partnership between Japan and Mexico , '' the two leaders said in a joint statement . talks would begin next month in Tokyo with the aim of concluding a pact within about a year , they said .

Greek soldiers had moved in Monday after a `` war of flags '' between Greek and Turkish nationals . Ankara had called for the immediate withdrawal of the Greek soldiers . both countries pulled back after intense pressure from the US government to end the ownership dispute by negotiation .

Switzerland is to return to Mexico around 100 million dollars -lrb- 60 million euros -rrb- belonging to disgraced former Mexican president Carlos_Salinas , Swiss daily le temps said Thursday . judge Paul_Perraudin will unblock the frozen funds -- scattered in a dozen or so bank accounts in Geneva and Zurich -- within the next few days , le temps newspaper said . Carlos_Salinas_de_Gortari , president of Mexico from 1988 to 1994 , was freed in 2005 after serving 10 years for authorising the murder of an opposition leader .

Su stunned the nation with his resignation Saturday , less than a week after he lost the ruling party 's primary for the 2008 presidential election . he was the fifth man to quit the job during Chen 's seven years in office .

Danish cyclist Rolf_Sorensen changed his mind on Tuesday and will compete in the Paris-Roubaix classic after all . Sorensen , the current World_Cup series leader , had originally said he would miss cycling 's premier one day race . `` Rolf has changed his mind because he is in such good form , '' Theo_de_Rooy , his rabobank team chief , said . `` Paris-Roubaix is such an historic race and he has a lead to maintain . he has a good opportunity to finish high up and score good points , '' De_Rooy added .
Japanese prime minister Taro_Aso and Chinese leaders have agreed to establish a hotline in a bid to build mutual trust between the Asian powers , Japanese officials said on Friday . in separate meetings Friday , Aso agreed with Chinese_Premier_Wen_Jiabao and president Hu_Jintao `` to conduct frequent and timely exchange of opinions through a telephone hotline , '' the Japanese government said in a statement . `` both sides also exchanged opinions on the current financial situation and agreed on roles which Japan and China should play regarding the issue , '' it said , without further elaborating .
Norway has donated about 424,000 US dollars to the African_Union -lrb- au -rrb- peace fund , the au said here late Monday . the money is to go partly towards organising an international conference for the great lakes region and to the establishment of an continental early warning system in the au 's conflict Management_Center -lrb- CMC -rrb- , the au statement added , quoting the Norwegian ambassador to Ethiopia , Mette_Ravn . since 1995 Norway has contributed over 1.3 million dollars to the au 's peace fund , the statement said . ambassador Ravn signed the grant agreement with ambassador Sam_Ibok for the au .
a British fugitive wanted by the Spanish police on charges of murdering his girlfriend was deported Wednesday , Philippine immigration officials said . Nicholas terence barrett , 35 , who was also using the assumed name of Richard_Nicholas bray , was accompanied back to Spain by Oscar_Coronel , deputy chief of the immigration bureau 's intelligence division and an unidentified member of interpol . barrett was arrested last week at a hotel in the downtown tourist district here after Spanish police provided information on his departure from Spain , following his alleged killing of Madeleine_Fabrianne , who was found dead in a tenerife parking lot in 1995 .
un secretary general Ban_Ki-moon will attend an international conference on Afghanistan due to be held in the capital , Kabul , in July , Afghan officials said Sunday . Ban told Afghan president Hamid_Karzai personally of his plans during a telephone call , the president 's office said . the conference is due to be held on July 20 as a follow up to talks in London in January that pledged international support for Karzai 's plans to reintegrate moderate taliban fighters who renounce violence . US officials said last month that secretary of State_Hillary clinton and other senior officials would take part in the July talks .
Ukraine will take part in joint military maneuvres to be held in Poland this summer under the auspices of NATO 's Partnership_for_Peace program , defense minister Vitaly_Radetsky said Monday . Polish , Hungarian and US troops are to take part in the June and July exercises with each party contributing a motorized unit and a group of officers , said Radetsky , cited by Interfax_news_agency . he said similar exercises could be held in the future on Ukrainian territory as two military bases have been set up for such maneuvres in the Odessa region on the Black_Sea and in the Carpathian mountains .
PLO chairman Yasser_Arafat returned to autonomy negotiations with Israel 's foreign minister Shimon_Peres on Sunday after having stormed out , the Israeli delegation announced . Arafat had quit the negotiation room amid differences over the role of the Palestinian police on the West_Bank and the release of Palestinian prisoners .
terror suspect Osama_bin_Laden is no longer in the region of Tora_Bora mountain in eastern Afghanistan , senior Afghan commander Haji_Mohammad_Zaman said Sunday . the mountains south of the city of Jalalabad have been the focus of the us-led hunt for bin_Laden since the start of December , but provincial military chief Zaman said he had managed to escape . `` he is not there , '' Zaman told reporters after a day of heavy fighting here , in which the commander said bin_Laden 's al-qaeda fighters had been cleaned out of the eastern province of Nangarhar .
injury-ridden England called up Dermot_Reeve to their World_Cup squad on Monday to replace injured all-rounder Craig_White . White injured a left side muscle during the group b win over the United_Arab_Emirates here on Sunday . World_Cup organisers PILCOM gave England supremo Ray_Illingworth the green light to draft in a new squad member . the Hong_Kong-born Reeve , an all-rounder , captains english county warwickshire . England also have batsmen Graeme_Hick -lrb- thigh -rrb- and Robin_Smith -lrb- groin -rrb- on the injured list but both are recovering well .
American challenger Travis_Simms captured the World_Boxing_Association super welterweight title here Saturday , knocking out Mexico 's Alejandro_Garcia in a battle of unbeatens . Simms broke from a clinch and fired a powerful let hook to the chin that dropped the champion to the canvas , where referee Sam_Viruet counted out the Mexican after one minute and 41 seconds of the fifth round . Simms rose to 23-0 with his 18th knockout . Garcia , who had knocked out all but one of his prior foes , fell to 22-1 .
Russia rejects any `` crude '' compromise deal with the United_States on missile deployments after Washington dropped its planned defence shield in eastern Europe , president Dmitry_Medvedev was quoted as saying Friday by Russian news agencies . `` if our partners hear some of our worries , we will be equally attentive to theirs , '' Medvedev said in an interview with Swiss media ahead of a state visit next week , the agencies reported . `` that means no compromises or primitive deals , '' he added when questioned about any concessions that Russia may have made in return for the end of the Star_Wars defence shield which the Kremlin had strongly opposed .

The_pope pronounced his special prayer in Saint_Peter 's square shortly after a suicide bomb went off in the central market of Tel_Aviv , Israel , killing four and wounding up to 30 . `` i feel spiritually close to their families , '' said the pope in a hoarse , barely audible voice . a handful of faithful gathered in the Vatican square to hear the ailing pontiff speak from the balcony of his apartment . John_Paul_II , 84 and in declining health , is being treated for numerous ailments including parkinson 's disease .

Thailand lifted a ban Wednesday on forming new political parties , but it remains unclear whether ousted premier Thaksin_Shinawatra 's party can regroup in time to contest polls expected by year 's end . the national Legislative_Assembly -lrb- NLA -rrb- , appointed by military leaders who toppled Thaksin in a coup last year , overwhelmingly adopted a bill revoking the junta 's ban on new parties , lawmaker Gothom_Arya said . Thai rak Thai -lrb- TRT -rrb- , the twice-elected party formed by Thaksin and led by him until his ouster , was dissolved in May after a court ruled that it had violated election laws .

Rene told the packed parliament that he was resigning `` because he was getting older '' and that he felt that he should `` hand over power to someone younger and who was loyal to the principles of continuing the work done over the years . '' representatives from all diplomatic missions in Victoria attended the session .

Leon_Garcia faces a fourth-round match against Croatia 's fifth seed Iva_Majoli , who beat Sandrine_Testud_of_France in a three-set marathon .

Nicu_Ceausescu , the youngest son of the late Romanian dictator , died aged 45 overnight at a Vienna hospital , doctors said on Thursday . Peter_Ferenci , one of his doctors at the akh hospital , told AFP that the man dubbed Romania 's `` most hated son '' for his role as his father nicolae 's deputy , had died but refused to give further details on the death . Ceausescu was rushed to hospital in Bucharest about two weeks ago and transferred to Vienna at the insistence of his brother valentin and his sister zoia . he was admitted to the gastro-enterology service of the akh hospital on September 18 .
French presidential candidates Nicolas_Sarkozy and Segolene_Royal are neck-and - neck in second-round voting intentions for the first time in a poll published Monday . socialist candidate Royal and right-wing favourite Sarkozy each got 50 percent support , according to a poll conducted by CSA-Cisco for Le_Parisien , aujourd ` hui en France and i tele . the poll asked who people would support if Sarkozy and Royal won through to the second and final round of the election by finishing in the first two places in Sunday 's first round .
talk with Putin will test bush 's inaugural pledges . the last time they sat down , president bush politely asked president Vladimir_Putin about Russia 's retreat from democracy . Putin , according to U.S. officials , responded with a testy tirade on Russian history , filibustering for so long that bush , left with an extended list of other issues to cover in a short private lunch , let the matter go without challenging the former KGB colonel . -lrb- by Jorge_Liu -rrb- .
The_United_States may impose trade sanctions against China under the so-called `` super 301 '' law for alleged intellectual trade violations , US_Trade_Representative Mickey_Kantor announced Thursday . Kantor said an inquiry will immediately begin to determine whether China failed to properly protect US patents and copyrights that American businesses say costs them 800 million dollars in sales annually . the designation of a special investigation requires that if the dispute is not resolved within several months , the United_States can impose sanctions on China .
Cuban president Fidel_Castro blamed the United_States for the fatal attempted hijacking of a plane by two deserting soldiers in Havana last week , in a newspaper article released Monday night . the failed attempt was `` a result of the freeing of a terrorist monster , '' Castro wrote , referring to the release from a US jail last month of Luis_Posada_Carrilles , a fierce opponent of his regime convicted of bombing a Cuban airliner .

Japanese prime minister Shinzo_Abe appointed his first ocean policy minister Tuesday to prepare for talks on territorial disputes with neighbouring nations and to ensure maritime safety . Tetsuo_Fuyushiba , minister of land , infrastructure and transport , will take up the additional cabinet post . `` i will tackle the mission of forging policies on oceans intensively and comprehensively , '' Fuyushiba told reporters after his appointment . Japan has a territorial dispute with China over drilling rights in the energy - rich East_China_Sea , and another with South_Korea over control of a cluster of islands in the sea of Japan -lrb- East_Sea -rrb- .

Nigerian dwarves on Wednesday urged their country 's new president , Umaru_Musa_Yar ` adua , to shun past practice and appoint them in his government . `` dwarfism does not make one less a man , '' Ola_Williams , the leader of the Abuja chapter of the National_Association for dwarves was quoted as saying by the official nan news agency said . Ola said dwarves had been overlooked for public jobs by past governments and challenged Yar ` adua as a `` true father of modern day Nigeria '' to consider short - statured people for positions if they had the necessary qualifications . no dwarf is on record as having held a political appointment since Nigeria gained independence from Britain in 1960 .

Tung , who will take up his post on July 1 , 1997 when Hong_Kong reverts from British to Chinese rule , is among 459 people on the Deng funeral committee , the official news agency said . Deng who died late Wednesday aged 92 from respiratory failure had expressed a desire to witness the return of Hong_Kong to Chinese sovereignty .

Israeli president Ezer_Weizman arrived here Monday for his first state visit to Egypt . Weizman was welcomed by president Hosni_Mubarak at the start of a three-day trip which has been given little prominence by the official media here . Weizman has paid around two dozen visits here , although this is his first as head of state . he strongly supported the Camp_David agreements in 1978 which paved the way for the israeli-egyptian peace treaty a year later . he has close relations with several leading Egyptian politicians . Yitzhak_Navon paid the only other visit to visit Egypt by an Israeli president in 1981 .

Russian writer and dissident Alexander_Solzhenitsyn died overnight Sunday to Monday , the Itar-Tass news agency said , citing his son stepan . he was 89 . Solzhenitsyn won the nobel prize for literature in 1970 after writing harrowing works about the Soviet_Union 's system of labour camps . he was expelled from the Soviet_Union in 1974 . since his return to Russia in 1994 he has been critical of the west and of Russia 's post-soviet evolution , calling for a return to traditional moral values .

Arafat died in the early hours of Thursday in a French military hospital near Paris . he was 75 .

the Finnish Agriculture_and_Forestry_Ministry announced Wednesday that it had banned imports of Russian horses because of dourine affecting them . dourine is an infectious disease of horses caused by a protozoan parasite , trypanosoma equiperdum , and no cases have evere been recorded in Finland . the disease is found in Asia , Africa and in some Latin_American countries . the disease is transmitted directly between horses , but not to man . the ban does not apply to returning horses registered in a European_Union country from Russia as long as they have not spent more than 30 days in Russia .

Russia on Wednesday cut Belarus 's gas supply by 60 percent , gazprom chief executive Alexei_Miller said , as a gas payment feud between Moscow and Minsk entered a third day . `` the bad news is the Belarussian side is undertaking no action to settle the debt for Russian gas supplies , '' Miller said in televised remarks . `` from 10 am on June 23 , 2010 a regime of limiting Russian gas supplies to Belarus by 60 percent is being introduced , '' Miller announced .

British prime minister Gordon_Brown has said he will not attend the EU-Africa summit in Portugal on December 8-9 after Mugabe declared he would be present at the talks . but Wade , who has expressed concern that the impasse between Zimbabwe and its former colonial ruler could derail the Lisbon summit , is making efforts to try to sort out matters .
a British man on Friday was found guilty of strangling his Cypriot wife and throwing her out of the window of their second-floor apartment `` like a sack of potatoes . '' David_Parris , 33 , was convicted of the manslaughter of his wife avgoustina , 34 , by a Nicosia court and will be sentenced on Monday . trial judge Takis_Eliades said Parris lost control during an argument with his wife at their Nicosia home and grabbed her round the neck , strangling her to death . Eliades said Parris then picked her up , dragged her over to the window and threw her out `` like a sack of potatoes . '' Parris had denied the manslaughter charge and claimed his wife jumped out of the window of her own accord .

Putin has referred to Russia 's low birthrate as the most serious problem facing the country and he has boosted child allowances to encourage more Russian women to have children . US president George_W._Bush on Wednesday discussed efforts to stem the worldwide financial crisis with German chancellor Angela_Merkel and president Luiz_Inacio_Lula_da_Silva , the White_House said . Bush telephoned Merkel `` to discuss the various measures that the United_States is taking to bring stability to the markets , as well as the importance for all countries to work together to coordinate our actions to address problems facing the global economy , '' said spokeswoman Dana_Perino . `` the president also returned a call to president Lula on the same topic , '' she said in a brief statement that offered no further details .
Russia will supply some 500,000 tonnes of grain to Iraq over the coming six months , the RIA_Novosti_news_agency quoted Russian agriculture minister Alexei_Gordeyev as saying Tuesday . Gordeyev said a Russian ship loaded with grain was already docked in one of Iraq 's ports , but provided no other details of the agreement . Russia had fought a furious diplomatic battle to avert the us-led war against its soviet-era ally , where it has large oil investments . Iraq also owes Moscow some eight billion dollars in soviet-era debt .

a woman who hired a hit man to kill her husband 's lover got more than she bargained for when the assassin murdered her instead , state media reported Monday . the Beijing woman agreed to pay Li_Changjiang 100,000 yuan -lrb- 12,100 US dollars -rrb- to kill or disfigure her husband 's mistress but when he failed to do so she demanded the money back . Li , with associates Zhang_Hongyu and Sun_Yanhai , showed they had no qualms about carrying out the deadly deed by killing her instead , the xinhua news agency said . the Beijing first intermediate people 's court sentenced Li to death Friday and he was executed Monday . Sun was sentenced to life imprisonment while Zhang remains at large .

Argentinian Luis_Oscar_Fullone was sacked on Friday as coach of the Burkina_Faso team - just a week before the African nations cup gets underway in Mali . `` Luis_Fullone is no longer a part of the set-up , '' said Burkina_Faso information minister Theodore_Kilimite who added the decision was sparked by the coach 's regular absences to make trips to France where his wife has been ill . Fullone , who was appointed last September , will be replaced by his assistants Jacques_Yameogo and Pihouri_Weboanga in the short term while a full-time replacement is found .
French president Nicolas_Sarkozy will Wednesday hold a government meeting on the country 's disastrous World_Cup exit , and on Thursday will meet veteran France striker Thierry_Henry , officials said . prime minister Francois_Fillon , sports minister Roselyne_Bachelot and junior sports minister Rama_Yade will meet Sarkozy to discuss the team 's dismal performance that ended Tuesday with a 2-1 defeat by South_Africa . the president will on Thursday meet with Henry , at the striker 's request , Sarkozy 's office said .
British prime minister David_Cameron has arrived in Afghanistan to assess for himself the situation on the ground , his Downing_Street office said . The_BBC quoted Cameron , who arrived Monday , as saying British troops could start coming home from Afghanistan as early as next year . progress against the taliban and in training Afghan military and police made him optimistic about the chances of a British troop withdrawal .
China on Tuesday announced foreign ministry spokesman Sun_Yuxi has been named as China 's first ambassador to Afghanistan in almost a decade . Sun -- who announced his own appointment at a regular press briefing -- will take up the post next month . China formally reopened its embassy in Kabul on February 6 after evacuating the diplomatic compound in 1993 during heavy fighting in the Afghan civil war . Beijing pledged 150 million dollars in aid to the interim Afghan government of Hamid_Karzai in late January .
Buster_Mathis senior , father of Mike_Tyson 's next opponent , and who fought Joe_Frazier unsuccessfully for the world heavyweight title in 1968 died from a heart attack here on Thursday . Mathis senior , 51 , took on Muhammad_Ali , the former champion stripped of his title for refusing to fight in Vietnam , in 1971 in Houston_Texas and came out with the immortal line : `` the mountain is coming to Muhammad . '' Mathis lost . Mathis had suffered from diabetes and hypertension for the past five years and recently had suffered two heart scares . his son is scheduled to fight Tyson on November 4th .
Iran 's Kamal_Kharazi will travel to Saudi_Arabia for Friday 's emergency meeting of foreign ministers from countries neighboring Iraq , state news agency IRNA reported . an Iranian embassy official in Riyadh told the agency Kharazi welcomed the invitation from his Saudi counterpart Prince_Saud_al-Faisal as-saud to take part in the forum on the situation in Iraq . Iran , which fought an eight-year war with saddam 's regime resulting in the death of more than one million lives on both sides , maintained a policy of `` active neutrality '' during the coalition war on Iraq .

Castro , arriving here after trips to China and Vietnam , is scheduled to meet Japanese foreign minister Yohei_Kono on Wednesday before leaving for home the same day .

a Nigerian high court ruled Wednesday that vice president Goodluck_Jonathan can take executive powers in the absence of ailing president Umaru_Yar ` adua , in hospital in Saudi_Arabia since November . judge Dan_Abutu , the chief judge of the Federal_High_Court in Abuja , gave the ruling in a case filed on Monday by a lawyer , Christopher_Onwuekwe , seeking the court 's interpretation of the constitution . `` by virtue of section 5 of the 1999 constitution , the vice president can perform the executive functions of the president pending the time he returns , '' Abutu said .
x-rays show Mike_Tyson 's right thumb is broken , according to the executive director of Nevada 's State_Athletic_Commission . `` it 's as clear as can be in the x-rays that there is a break , '' Marc_Ratner said . `` it 's clear even to a layman like me . '' the injury forced the cancellation of Tyson 's scheduled fight here Saturday with Buster_Mathis_Jnr . skeptical observers wondered if Tyson might have faked the injury because barely one-tenth of the fight 's tickets had been sold . Ratner said the x-rays could only be made public if Tyson permits under doctor-patient confidentiality rules . Four doctors , two of them Tyson 's looked at the x-rays and agreed there was a break , Ratner said .

Herrero 's replacement will be announced on December 8 .
Kenyan police said Wednesday they had arrested a Nigerian preacher after almost 10 kilogrammes of heroin was found in his luggage when he arrived at Nairobi 's international airport . the Nigerian was arrested Friday upon his arrival from Dubai with 9.6 kilos -lrb- 21 pounds -rrb- of narcotics packed in with automotive spare parts , the head of Kenya 's airport police unit Thomas_Chigamba told AFP . `` he told me he was a pastor and even preached and pleaded with our officers to release him because he was a priest , '' Chigamba said . the man is due to be charged with trafficking in narcotics later this week , he added .

Giorgio_Corbelli , the president of Italian second division club napoli , was released from prison on Saturday , ANSA news agency reported . Ohga , who is also chairman of consumer electronics giant Sony_Corp. , said foreign semiconductor makers no longer needed assistance from the Japanese government as they had achieved their market share of 20 percent . `` the objective of the agreement has been fully achieved , '' he said . the agreement was reached in 1986 and renewed for five years in 1991 .

Soro led an abortive coup against Gbagbo in 2002 , triggering a brief civil war that has left the west African country divided ever since .

Botham and former England test colleague Allan_Lamb took the former Pakistan all-rounder to court in July over what they described as an `` offensive personal attack '' on them in ` India_Today ' magazine which they claimed called them racist and uneducated . former all-rounder Botham is appealing on the grounds that the jury was misdirected during the High_Court libel action , which they lost in July , leaving them with an estimated 400,000 legal bill . south african-born Lamb said last week he was considering an appeal against the verdict .

Sweden 's Robert_Karlsson won the season ending Dubai_World_Championship here on Sunday after a play-off with England 's Ian_Poulter . both players had birdied the first extra hole but disaster befell Poulter on the second as after pitching onto the green to 30 feet , he dropped his ball on his marker and it flipped over . after checking with a referee Poulter was told he was putting for par rather than birdie and left it short . Karlsson therefore had two for victory , but made his for birdie . it was a costly moment for Poulter as there was a difference of nearly 260,000 pounds between first and second .

an aide to US president George_W._Bush resigned Friday over charges he had resorted to plagiarism in his writings . Timothy_Goeglein , who served as a liaison between Bush and religious organizations , `` accepted responsibility for the columns published under his name in his local newspaper , and has apologized for not upholding the standards expected by the president , '' White_House spokeswoman Dana_Perino said in a statement . an internal investigation conducted by The_News-Sentinel , a newspaper published in Fort_Wayne , Indiana , has revealed that 20 out of 38 columns published by Goeglein between 2000 and 2008 had portions copied from other sources without attribution .

Qatari foreign minister Hamad_bin_Jassem_bin_Jabr_al-Thani discussed bilateral relations and the Middle_East peace process here Friday with his Indonesian counterpart Ali_Alatas , officials said . sheikh al-Thani and Alatas also discussed the results of the summit of the Organization_of_the_Islamic_Conference -lrb- OIC -rrb- held in Islamabad last weekend , the officials said . they signed a letter committing the Gulf monarchy and world 's largest moslem nation to stepping up economic cooperation and investment protection . several thousand Indonesians work in Qatar and other Gulf monarchies .
Israeli police detained nuclear whistleblower Mordechai_Vanunu Friday as he headed to christmas eve mass in the West_Bank town of Bethlehem carrying a Santa hat , a spokesman said . `` we arrested him when he travelled to Bethlehem despite the restrictions imposed on him , '' said spokemsan Shmuel_Ben_Ruby . `` he had with him a father christmas hat . '' Vanunu , 50 , converted to christianity during 18 years ' imprisonment imposed after he leaked details of Israel 's secret nuclear arsenal to a British weekly newspaper . since his release last April , he has spent most of his time at Jerusalem 's St_George 's anglican cathedral .
the US ambassador to Belarus `` will remain in Minsk '' while the State_Department reviews the situation , a spokesman said Friday , denying she had been expelled . `` the press reports that we got this morning had indicated she had been expelled from the country , formally told that she must leave . that is not true , '' State_Department deputy spokesman Tom_Casey told reporters . `` ambassador -lrb- karen -rrb- stewart has not been expelled . the Belarussian government has suggested -- i think that is the polite phrase -- that she return to the United_States for consultations . `` she is in Minsk , and she will remain in Minsk while we continue to review the situation , '' Casey said .
Estonia 's president Lennart_Meri will make an official visit to China from June 12-18 at the invitation of his Chinese counterpart Jiang_Zemin , the foreign ministry said Thursday . Meri will be the first Estonian head of state to visit China since the establishment of diplomatic ties between the two countries in September 1991 . Beijing and Tallin in May last year signed a five-year accord on trade and economic cooperation which provided for mutual trading privileges . the accord was signed during a visit to Beijing by Estonian prime minister Tiit_Vahi .
un weapons inspectors are uncovering evidence that Iraqi president Saddam_Hussein is lying , NATO secretary general George_Robertson said here Friday . `` now the inspectors are uncovering clear evidence that Saddam has continued to lie to the un , '' Robertson said in a speech in London . `` in the light of this chain of events , it seems to me that if Saddam does not change course completely , the international community must act if it , and especially the un , is not to lose all credibility in the face of dictators and outlaw regimes throughout the world , '' Robertson added .
Turkey and Afghanistan on Thursday signed a military cooperation agreement , the first such agreement between the two muslim countries since 1921 . the pact foreshadows training of Afghan soldiers in Turkey , technical and scientific cooperation , and exchanges of personnel and information , a Turkish military official told AFP . Turkish general Akin_Zorlu , who currently leads the kabul-based International_Security_Assistance_Force , and Afghanistan 's deputy defence minister general Atiqullah_Baralay signed the pact in a ceremony at the Defence_ministry .
Russian parliamentary speaker Gennady_Seleznyov has called a special session on Saturday during which Viktor_Chernomyrdin is expected to reconfirmed as prime minister , interfax quoted a spokesman as saying Monday . Viktor_Cheremukhin , a spokesman for the duma , the lower house of parliament , said Seleznyov had called the session the day after Russian president Boris_Yeltsin was scheduled to be sworn in for a second term . Yeltsin has already said he will reappoint Chernomyrdin as premier , but must await his inauguration before he can constitutionally select a premier . under the Russian constitution , the president 's nominee must be approved by the duma .
US national security adviser Condoleezza_Rice said Thursday that defeating al-qaeda had been `` the very first major national security policy directive '' by president George_W._Bush after he took office in January 2001 . `` it was the very first major national security policy directive of the Bush administration -- not Russia , not missile defense , not Iraq , but the elimination of al-qaeda , '' Rice said in landmark sworn testimony to the official September 11 inquiry in Washington .

the Nordic countries announced Tuesday they will not be contributing troops to the multi-national force to Albania . at their weekly informal meeting in Jakobshavn , western Greenland , the region 's defence ministers decided it would be impossible to organise a battalion on such short notice , Danish defence spokesman major Nils_Greier told AFP . while Denmark was willing to contribute to the make-up of the force -- led by Italy and already numbering 5,000 soldiers -- Norway , Sweden and Finland had reservations , Greier said .

Jackson 's last appearance in Italy was when he defended himself against accusations of plagiarism in a Rome court on February 3 . the court has yet to rule on allegations by Italian singer albano that Jackson had lifted one of his songs .

Soyinka and three others currently abroad were not present when the two-count charge was read at the magistrate 's court . the eleven others , who were present , include chief Olu_Falae , a former finance minister under the regime of general Ibrahim_Babangida , and Frederick_Fasheun , a physician . Falae and Fasheun are leading members of the opposition coalition NADECO and were former presidential candidates .

Iran and Egypt have decided to restore full diplomatic relations and are expected do so within days , Iranian Vice-President Mohammad_Ali_Abtahi told Al-Jazeera television Tuesday . `` the decision to restore relations has been taken , '' he told the qatar-based channel . `` and in the coming days , inshallah -lrb- god willing -rrb- , we will see the resumption of our relations . '' Abtahi said the decision to work towards restoring full diplomatic ties , cut nearly a quarter of a century ago , was taken at a meeting between Egyptian president Hosni_Mubarak and Iranian president Mohammad_Khatami in Geneva last month .

a suspected guerrilla fighter and his accomplice were killed in a police raid in Russia 's troubled southern region of Ingushetia , Russian news agencies reported . `` Magomed_Gardanov , suspected of committing several terrorist acts , was killed '' in the republic 's capital Nazran , the local FSB state security official said as quoted by RIA_Novosti . police also killed a woman reported as Gardanov 's accomplice and injured another woman and a teenage boy , interfax reported . the pro-kremlin authorities in Ingushetia , like other mainly muslim regions of Russia 's Northern_Caucasus , has been seeking to quell an islamist insurgency over the past years that has claimed scores of lives .

The_United_States said Thursday it agreed on a spy swap with Russia on `` national security and humanitarian grounds '' as it determined it would gain little by imprisoning Moscow 's agents . `` a determination to seek a rapid and comprehensive solution was made on national security and humanitarian grounds , '' State_Department spokesman Mark_Toner said . `` no significant national security benefit would be gained from the prolonged incarceration in the United_States of these 10 unlawful agents , '' he said . Toner issued the statement after 10 Russian spy suspects pleaded guilty in a New_York courtroom , after which prosecutors said they would be swapped for four western spies from Moscow .

US_Attorney general Eric_Holder is to visit the controversial US military detention center at Guantanamo_Bay next week , he said Wednesday . the announcement comes after president Barack_Obama vowed to close the prison -- which holds around 240 terrorism suspects -- by January next year . Holder and defense secretary Robert_Gates have been charged with carrying out a review to determine the fate of the installation 's detainees , a task which presents major legal and political headaches for the Obama administration . Holder said that the administration will determine who can be released , those prisoners who can face justice and those that will remain in detention . the dates of the visit are not yet clear .

Maguire 's wife sabrina confirmed the extent of his injuries tonight . `` Adrian 's arm is broken . he has broken his humerus , the bone between his shoulder and elbow . it is a clean break but he is in a lot of pain , '' she said .

China 's top taoist leader , who heads the government body in charge of supervising believers of the faith , has died at the age of 80 , the xinhua news agency said Monday . Min_Zhiting , president of the China_Taoist_Association , died in Beijing on Saturday , xinhua said , but did not give a cause of death or details . the taoist or daoist association which Min headed is quasi governmental and and all taoist temples must belong to the group . Min was also a member of the Standing_Committee_of_China 's top government advisory body , the Chinese people 's political consultative conference .

Ichiro_Suzuki set the Seattle_Mariners ' record for stolen bases on Sunday , stealing a pair of bases in the 3-2 victory over San_Diego in an interleague contest . leading off the bottom of the first inning with an infield single , Ichiro stole second to become Seattle 's all-time stolen base leader with 291 , passing Julio_Cruz , who played for the team from 1977-83 . Suzuki then stole third and scored on Jose_Lopez 's groundout . they were the 19th and 20th stolen bases of the year for Ichiro , who has been caught just once .
Poland 's former foreign minister Krzysztof_Skubiszewski , who forged the country 's foreign policy after the collapse of communism , died Monday in Warsaw aged 83 , the foreign ministry said . an expert in international law , in 1989 Skubiszewski was charged by Poland 's first post-communist prime minister Tadeusz_Mazowiecki with the task of tailoring a foreign policy independent of Poland 's soviet-era master Moscow . Skubiszewski remained foreign minister until 1993 , under four consecutive Polish governments .
a Polish court decided Wednesday to extradite an alleged Israeli_Mossad agent to Germany over claims he is linked to the January killing of a hamas chief , despite Israel 's calls for him to go home . `` the court has decided to hand over Uri_Brodsky to German authorities for judicial procedures there , '' Warsaw regional court judge Tomasz_Talkiewicz said following a closed hearing . `` the court did not decide whether Brodsky committed the crime for which he is under investigation , the court only checked whether the extradition request fulfils the formal requirements and whether the suspect is correctly identified , '' he said .

a german-funded ferry for delivering humanitarian aid from Tajikistan into Afghanistan was launched Monday , a spokesman for the Russian emergencies situations ministry said here . the cable ferry will be able to transport up to 80,000 tonnes of aid at a time over the river Pyandzh from the Tajik border post at lower Pyandzh in southern Tajikistan to the Afghan port of sherkhan , the same source said . Russian and Tajik specialists built and installed the ferry at a cost of 410,000 euros -lrb- 362,000 dollars -rrb- , with finance provided by the German government .

Two others -- group leader Laura_Silsby and her confidante Charisa_Coulter -- remained behind and in detention in Port-au-Prince because the judge wants to determine their motives for an earlier trip to Haiti before the quake , their lawyer said .

Lindh , 46 , was injured in the arm and the abdomen by an unknown assailant in a crowded downtown department store . her condition was serious but not life-threatening , police said . the attack came ahead of a euro referendum Sunday in which the popular politician has been a high-profile campaigner for Sweden to join the common European currency .

Philippine vice president Teofisto_Guingona will stay on as foreign minister , the presidential palace said Thursday , over-turning an earlier announcement that he had resigned . the announcement came after Guingona sought a one-on-one meeting with president Gloria_Arroyo hours after presidential spokesman Silvestre_Afable released an official document that purportedly accepted his resignation as foreign minister . Afable claimed he had made a mistake by releasing the letter , which Arroyo had signed , to the press , and said he should have `` discarded '' it . `` i made a conclusion on my own that i thought it was for release , '' Afable told reporters .
NATO secretary general Jaap_de_Hoop_Scheffer `` warmly '' welcomed Wednesday France 's decision to fully reintegrate into the alliance 's military command . `` i warmly welcome the French president 's choice , '' Scheffer said , after president Nicolas_Sarkozy announced the full return , more than 40 years after Charles_de_Gaulle pulled out in the name of national independence . `` it is now of course up to the French parliament to state its position , but the president has clearly indicated that the process that should lead France to resume its full place has reached its final stage , '' he said in a statement .

Xi , who had long been tipped for the promotion , becomes the second civilian member of the commission besides Hu , who is slated to step down as head of the Communist_Party in 2012 and as president the following year .

Abraham_Lincoln was assassinated in 1865 . the prevention of terrorism ordinance was later passed by parliament .
former French prime minister Michel_Debre , the father of the French constitution and one of general Charles_de_Gaulle 's closest aides , died Friday at his home in central France , his son bernard announced in a communique . Debre , 84 , became prime minister under the Fifth_Republic from 1958 to 1962 after being justice minister . he became one of De_Gaulle 's most faithful lieutenants after joining the resistance movement in world war ii during the nazi occupation of France .

Canada has already closed its embassy , but some diplomatic staff remain to aid Canadian nationals in the country .

Russian president Vladimir_Putin has fired his chief of staff Alexander_Voloshin , a Kremlin spokesman said late Thursday . the announcement came after days of political turmoil and media rumors that the powerful Kremlin aide had quit over the controversial arrest of tycoon Mikhail_Khodorkovsky , chief of Russia 's top oil producer yukos . a quiet power behind the Kremlin throne who was always at Putin 's side at top meetings , Voloshin , 47 , held the third ranking post in the Russian hierarchy and was seen as an advocate of liberal reform and big business interests .

China said Thursday that it was difficult to maintain `` friendly relations '' with Norway , following the oslo-based Nobel_committee 's decision to award this year 's peace prize to a Chinese dissident . `` it is difficult to maintain friendly relations with Norway as in the past , '' foreign ministry spokeswoman Jiang_Yu told reporters . in October , the nobel peace prize was awarded to Liu_Xiaobo , who was jailed in December 2009 for 11 years on subversion charges after co-authoring charter 08 , a bold petition calling for democratic reform in one-party China . Beijing was furious over the decision to honour Liu , saying it was tantamount to encouraging crime .

Leo_Malet , the French writer who popularised the US-style detective story in post-war France , has died at the age of 86 , relatives said Thursday . Malet who began writing in 1942 during the German occupation , was best known for his fictional character Nestor_Burma , a truculent private detective based in Paris . Malet died on Sunday on the eve of his 87th birthday , of heart failure . he was buried on Wednesday outside Paris , his entourage said .

Saint-Andre 's successor will be named on Saturday with forwards Olivier_Roumat and Fabien_Pelous listed among the favourites .
Cuba and Spain signed Tuesday an agreement creating a mechanism for political consultation , to include the sensitive human rights issue . visiting Spanish foreign minister Miguel_Angel_Moratinos and his Cuban counterpart Felipe_Perez_Roque signed an `` agreement for the establishment of political consultations , including a dialogue on Human_Rights . '' `` we stand before a novel mechanism , '' Moratinos said . `` first will be discussion of a timetable for setting and approaching issues . absolutely no matter will be excluded , '' he said in a joint press conference alongside Perez_Roque .

more than three months of un inspections in Iraq have shown that the country does not have weapons of mass destruction despite US and British claims , a senior official said Sunday . `` Iraq does not have weapons of mass destruction and the inspections of the past three months have shown that , '' Hosam_Mohammed_Amin , head of the National_Monitoring_Directorate -lrb- NMD -rrb- , told a press conference . `` all the American and British accusations are lies and allegations without foundation , '' said Amin , whose directorate liaises with the un inspectors .

'' -lrb- NEC -rrb- will introduce the so-called 2.5 generation , high quality digital mobile phone handsets , '' the Asahi_Shimbun newspaper said without citing sources . the company , which withdrew from the US market in 2000 , will eventually introduce third-generation mobile phones , which are capable of downloading moving images , the asahi said . NEC holds about 30 percent of the Japanese domestic market for mobile phone handsets and about three percent of the global market , the asahi said .

the us-led war on Iraq has upset the behaviour of migrating birds , frightening them into flying north earlier than usual , a Turkish biologist was quoted by the Anatolia_news_agency as saying on Tuesday . bombardment and ground fighting have scared many birds including falcons and hawks into migrating to Turkey too early in the year , according to professor Mehmet_Siki of the Aegean Izmir university . the Euphrates and Tigris rivers form natural migration channels for birds travelling north from Iraq towards their nesting place at the rivers ' source in southeast Turkey . Siki fears that the war could endanger the bird population , by scaring them into areas unsuitable for nesting .

'' Schaefer said IFOR had to await the outcome of the Bosnian elections scheduled for September before deciding how much longer it would have to stay in Bosnia . but he said he thought the IFOR contingent could be scaled down after December 31 .
The_World_Cup ski jumping event planned for Zakopane in Poland on Saturday was called off due to high winds and will take place on Sunday instead , organisers said . it was the second round scheduled for the Polish venue this weekend after austrian teenager Gregor_Schlierenzauer won the opening jump on Friday ahead of Norway 's Anders_Jacobsen and Thomas_Morgenstern of Austria . Morgenstern , who has won six events this season , leads the World_Cup standings with an advantage of over 300 points on second placed Janne_Ahonen of Finland .
former Afghan president Sibghatullah_Mojaddedi on Saturday welcomed the victory of the Taliban_Islamic movement , saying it may signal a `` bright future '' for Afghanistan . `` we hope that with the victory of the Taliban_Islamic_Movement our moslem nation would witness a bright future by leading a peaceful and prosperous life within the framework of a truly islamic government , '' he said . Mojaddedi voiced his support to the taliban in a statement a day after the militia stormed into Kabul , ousting the coalition government of his former mujahedeen colleagues , Burhanuddin_Rabbani and Gulbuddin_Hekmatyar .
Russian foreign minister Igor_Ivanov on Wednesday strongly rejected the claims of the us-led coalition against Iraq that the military conflict in the country is a war of liberation . `` it has become more and more clear how far from reality their attempts are to present the military action against Iraq as a triumphant march to liberate the Iraqi people with minimal victims and damage , '' the Interfax_news_agency quoted Ivanov as saying . Russia has been one of the most outspoken opponents to the us-led war to oust Iraqi president Saddam_Hussein and has said it would appeal to the United_Nations to rule on the war 's legality .
Ukrainian Alexander_Gurov regained the European light-heavyweight title here Tuesday when he stopped French title-holder Patrice_Aouissi in the fifth round . Aouissi suffered a bad cut over his right eye in the third round and was well behind on points and taking a battering when the referee stepped in to save him from more punishment . Gurov lost the title when Aouissi knocked him out in the third round in March .

Knox 's then-boyfriend and co-defendant Raffaele_Sollecito was also found guilty and imprisoned for 25 years . Knox began weeping when the judge began reading out the lengthy verdict , while Sollecito 's face was blank .

Rodel_Mayol of the Philippines retained his WBC straw-weight world title in a controversial finish to his defence against Mexico 's Omar_Nino in Guadalajara late Saturday . with 40 seconds to go in the third round Nino delivered a low blow that saw the champion drop his guard and then the Mexican floored him with a left hook . Mayol was taken out of the ring on a stretcher while Nino celebrated in his corner thinking he had won . the WBC vice-president Mauricio_Sulaiman , however , then announced to a stunned crowd that the bout had been declared a draw and that a rematch had automatically been ordered .

Saul took over from sir John_Swan , a leading pro-independence figure who had served as premier for 13 years . Swan had put his political career on the line by championing a break from Britain after 311 years of rule from London , and saying he would step aside if bermudians voted against inhdependence in the referendum held August 16 . they voted overwhelmingly to continue under British sovereignty with an elected local government .

Mbahou had been close to the opposition while in exile in France since 1997 , when Lissouba , the country 's first democratically-elected president , fled after a civil war which returned current president Denis_Sassou_Nguesso to power .

Ecuadoran police have thwarted a plot by colombians from the city of Cali to assassinate Ecuadoran president Lucio_Gutierrez , authorities said Thursday . general Edgar_Vaca told Ecuador 's congress that the assassins had received 100 million Colombian pesos -lrb- 37,000 dollars -rrb- to buy armament and were to be paid 1.5 million dollars for the job . Vaca said the plot was uncovered with the aid of Colombian police . Gutierrez , a leftist retired army officer and former coup leader , came to power in January after convincingly winning election in November .

'' Boutros-Ghali was seen off by vice foreign minister Liu_Huaqiu . during his stay in Beijing he met China 's senior leaders for talks on international affairs and on the world conference on women , which is to be held next year in the Chinese capital .
NATO 's expulsion of two Russian diplomats in connection with an Estonian spy scandal will not go unanswered , Russia 's ambassador to the alliance , Dmitry_Rogozin , warned Thursday . `` this is a very provocative action that can not go without answer , '' Rogozin told reporters in Brussels . however he promised a `` cool-headed reaction '' . `` we are not going to lose our temper , those who did that want to undermine the wish of the presidents of our two countries -lrb- US and Russia -rrb- to have good relations , '' he added .
North_Korean leader Kim_Jong-Il told Chinese president Hu_Jintao in talks this week in Beijing that he remained committed to ending his country 's nuclear drive , Chinese state media said Friday . Kim also told Hu that his country would `` work with China to create favourable conditions '' for restarting six-nation talks hosted by Beijing on dismantling the Pyongyang 's nuclear programmes , xinhua news agency said . but the report gave no indication when those talks could resume .
Bangladesh 's former air chief Jamaluddin_Ahmed was jailed Thursday for allegedly abusing two subordinates , police said . Ahmed was arrested at home on charges filed Wednesday by Air_Force sergeant Matiur_Rahman , who said Ahmed had allegedly beaten and abused him and a colleague , the official BSS news agency said , quoting police . Rahman said Ahmed , who retired last year , got out of his car and accused them of spying on him , when they were in fact distributing invitation cards , the agency said . a magistrate court refused bail and sent him to jail , BSS said . formal charges have yet to be made .

defense secretary Robert_Gates has decided to replace the commander of US forces in Afghanistan , general David_McKiernan , a pentagon official said on Monday . Gates plans to name general Stanley_McChrystal , a former commander of special operations who now serves as director of the Joint_Chiefs_of_Staff , as the new commander , the official , speaking on condition of anonymity , told AFP . the move , to be announced later at a news conference at the pentagon , suggested a lack of confidence in McKiernan , who has been on the job less than a year having taken over command in June 2008 .

Brazilian_Air_Force minister lelio viana lobo , who signed the agreement , was accompanied by executives of two Brazilian national carriers , varig and VASP , who are to hold talks with Air_China , it said .

Mexican president Vicente_Fox Friday replaced his public safety secretary in a bid to combat lawlessness in Mexico , which has some 4.5 million crimes each year . Fox accepted the resignation of Alejandro_Gertz_Manero and named deputy interior minister Ramon_Martin_Huerta to the cabinet post that oversees all of Mexico 's federal law enforcement agencies . `` we must better respond to the challenges currently at hand , '' said Fox . the shuffle was part of Fox 's July 1 announcement of 10 changes to improve public safety after a massive June 27 march in Mexico_City by citizens demanding better policing .

Jordanian customs officials have seized 15 pieces of antiquities concealed in the body of a car that smugglers tried to bring into the kingdom from Iraq , customs director Mahmud_Qoteishat said Tuesday . statues and old coins were among the artefacts seized Monday at the al-karamah border post , Qoteishat told the official petra news agency . the objects , which were concealed in the vehicle 's heater , were sent to the Jordanian department of antiquities in Amman for identification , he added . Jordan has frequently reported seizing antiquities at its border with Iraq since the fall of the Baghdad regime six months ago and the widespread wave of looting that followed .

Wu is an expected economist and once headed the Taiwan_Institute_of_Economic_Research , a private think tank , for many years .
Ailing_Palestinian leader Yasser_Arafat will be flown to Paris `` imminently '' for hospital treatment , a French presidential spokesman said Thursday . the spokesman said that at the request of the Palestinian_Authority , France was sending a plane to the region to airlift Arafat to Paris .
US authorities are investigating two separate tunnels , crossing from Mexico to the United_States , that were discovered by border patrol guards in California , the US_Immigration_and_Customs_Enforcement service said Thursday . one tunnel was discovered Wednesday , the other last week , said ICE spokeswoman Lauren_Mack . one of the tunnels is an extension of one found in May 2003 and has been shut down on the California side of the border , she said . it originated at a house in the Mexican border city of Tijuana , and reached to the US frontier city of San_Ysidro .
the Belgian national football squad arrived in the southern Japanese city of Kumamoto on Thursday to set up a World_Cup base camp as Japan 's main rivals in group h . they were greeted by some 800 citizens in a welcoming ceremony and decorated with bouquets and origami -lrb- folded paper -rrb- cranes , a symbol of goodwill , according to press reports . Belgium , also grouped with Russia and Tunisia , are due to play Japan on June 4 in Saitama near Tokyo . they will warm up with matches against a Kyushu selection on Tuesday and Costa_Rica on Sunday , both in Kumamoto .
an islamist group has executed Italian hostage Enzo_Baldoni in Iraq , arabic-language satellite news channel Al-Jazeera reported on Thursday . Baldoni 's captors , a group calling itself the Islamic_Army in Iraq , had on Tuesday threatened to kill their hostage unless Italy withdrew its 3,000 troops from Iraq within 48 hours . the Italian government initially rejected the kidnappers ' ultimatum , saying it would maintain its `` civil and military '' presence in Iraq , but early on Thursday Rome said it was prepared to pull its soldiers out if the interim government in Baghdad requested it .
valencia have agreed to part company with their German goalkeeper Timo_Hildebrand , the former international 's agent revealed on Thursday . Hildebrand , 29 , joined valencia from Stuttgart in 2007 having just won the German title , but failed to settle in Spain . his contract was initially due to expire in 2010 . Hildebrand played 26 league games last season , but this season he has not featured in the first team since the Spanish super cup on August 24 . a return to the bundesliga could now be on the cards , with hoffenheim and Cologne reportedly interested in acquiring his services .

'' .
Russian president Vladimir_Putin and Australian prime minister John_Howard on Friday signed a landmark deal for the export of uranium to Russia . but Howard quickly moved to allay fears in Australia that sales of yellow cake , set to be used in domestic Russian civilian reactors , would pose a potential nuclear risk . `` any uranium that is sold to Russia will be sold under very strict safeguards , '' Howard said at a joint press conference with Putin in Sydney , where both will attend a weekend Asia_Pacific summit .
French rugby federation president Bernard_Lapasset has asked France 's teams to pull out of this year 's inaugural European cup . Lapasset , speaking on sud radio , said he was unhappy that revenues earned from the event 's sponsors and television were to be distributed directly to the clubs rather than to national federations . castres , Toulouse , and Begles are due to represent France in this year 's tournament , kicking off on October 31 with the final being held at Cardiff on January 7 next year . teams from Wales , Ireland , Italy and Romania are also due to take part , with english and Scottish teams joining in next season .
Canadian judge Louise_Arbour , the un 's former chief war crimes prosecutor , has been named the new United_Nations_High_Commissioner_for_Human_Rights , un officials said on Friday . Arbour , who currently sits on Canada 's supreme court , made her name on the international stage serving on the tribunals investigating the 1994 genocide in Rwanda and the rights abuses in the former Yugoslavia . un secretary general Kofi_Annan tapped Arbour to replace his close friend Sergio_Vieira_de_Mello , who was killed in the August 19 bombing of the un 's headquarters in Baghdad . her appointment was to be announced later in the day .

Wang told an emergency meeting of the Security_Council that `` bloodshed and conflict would lead to a national tragedy of fratricide '' between the two Koreas , damage regional stability and affect neighbouring countries .

Haiti is already the second largest recipient of Canadian development aid , after Afghanistan .

a greenhouse at Norway 's royal palace was totally destroyed by a fire early Monday and arson is suspected , Oslo police said . while the 550 square-meter -lrb- 5.920 square-foot -rrb- greenhouse burned to the ground , the adjacent palace was not touched by the blaze . `` we can not be sure that it was arson but there are indications , '' Oslo police official Finn_Abrahamsen told AFP . according to Norwegian news agency NTB , another annex of the royal palace , a warehouse , caught fire but those flames were quickly extinguished . `` the palace was at no time in danger of burning , '' Abrahamsen said . a police inquiry has been opened to determine the cause of the fire .

Colombian authorities seized three tons of extremely pure cocaine from the powerful Cali cartel on Thursday , anti-narcotics police said . no arrests were made during the operation in eastern Colombia near the border with Venezuela , according to colonel Leonardo_Gallego , director of the anti-narcotics division of the national police . Gallego said the area is a major transshipment point for cocaine coming from Peru , Bolivia and Ecuador which is then purified in Colombia and re-exported to the United_States and Europe . police also seized five automobiles and destroyed clandestine landing strips .

Egyptian president Hosni_Mubarak proclaimed Tuesday that the Coptic_Christian christmas , celebrated on January 7 , will be celebrated as a national holiday . Mubarak , speaking on a visit to the southern town of Aswan , said the coptic christmas will be `` an official holiday for christians and muslims . '' until now , christmas and easter have been festivals only for christians , while the muslim holidays of eid al-fitr and al-adha have been so for everyone . of Egypt 's population of 65 million , copts account for 5.8 million , according to official figures . the Coptic_church , however , puts the figure at more than 10 million .

Fleury 's visit to Tehran follows a trip to Paris by Verdinejad in April 1994 . AFP already transmits the services of several news agencies in the region .

Musharraf on Saturday shook Vajpayee 's hand on the summit stage and told the Indian leader he wants dialogue with his arch-rival . asked about the gesture , Vajpayee said : `` my hand is still intact . '' .
German chancellor Helmut_Kohl arrived here on Thursday for a private meeting with French prime minister Edouard_Balladur at his holiday chalet in this Alpine resort . Balladur and Kohl were to lunch with their wives and advisors Nicolas_Bazire and Joachim_Bitterlich . officials described the meeting as a `` family '' occasion . Kohl declined a ride in a cable car to a nearby 2,525 metre -lrb- 8,000 feet -rrb- summit . `` when i was young , i climbed mountains , but i stopped at the age of 50 because it was dangerous , '' the chancellor said .

Britain and Germany will contribute helicopters and troops to help Dutch authorities carry out flood operations , the defense ministry said Thursday . Germany will send 50 aircraft and Britain 15 , along with 100 soldiers from each country . the German aircraft and half of the British chinooks and pumas were on alert at a German air base , while the other British copters were ready to leave from Britain , a ministry spokesman said . the Volkel air base in central Netherlands will coordinate the foreign helicopters ' operations , the spokesman added .

president Bill_Clinton has ordered an additional 3,500 US troops to Kuwait , a democratic senator said Tuesday after meeting with Clinton at the White_House . senator Joseph_Lieberman told reporters Clinton issued the order late Monday . the additional troops will join 1,200 US troops already in Kuwait to participate in military exercises in a show of force against Iraq . the plan to deploy troops was originally announced Friday but delayed after Kuwait considered granting the United_States permission to send the troops .
guerrillas attacked an Israeli patrol with small arms and anti-tank rockets on the edge of Israel 's `` security zone '' in south Lebanon Sunday but there were no casualties , security officials said . later four sager missiles were fired at the patrol but missed it . no group claimed responsibility for the attack . the Israeli_army later shelled villages near the central sector of the zone , where the attack took place , Lebanese police said . no casualties were reported . iranian-backed hezbollah guerrillas spearhead attacks on Israeli troops and the proxy South_Lebanon_Army -lrb- SLA -rrb- , which have increased in the past weeks .

Israel has agreed that the eventual burial of comatose Palestinian leader Yasser_Arafat can take place in the West_Bank_city of Ramallah , Palestinian negotiations minister Saeb_Erakat said Wednesday . `` Israel made it known to us a few minutes ago that the Israeli government agrees to a Palestinian request to bury president Arafat in the Muqataa , '' Erakat told AFP , referring to Arafat 's battered headquarters . Israeli public radio had earlier reported that prime minister Ariel_Sharon 's security cabinet had given the go-ahead for the burial in Ramallah .

Edry , arrested over the weekend , was suspected of links with the anti- Arab kach movement which was outlawed after its leader praised Baruch_Goldstein , for the murders . Goldstein , from Kiryat_Arba , spent years as a kach militant .

Australian prime minister Kevin_Rudd said here Wednesday he was ready to meet with the Dalai_Lama in the future after missing him during the exiled Tibetan leader 's ongoing visit . Rudd , a mandarin-speaking sinophile , said he was unable to meet the Dalai_Lama , currently in Australia , due to his own visit to Japan and Indonesia . but he noted that previous Australian leaders had met with the buddhist monk , whose talks with foreign officials are criticised by China . `` i will see no course to deviate from the practice adopted in the past , which is to meet with him , '' Rudd told a news conference in Tokyo .
most of the Ethiopian football team defected to Italy on Tuesday after stopping over in Rome on their way to an African nations cup match against Morocco . the plane stayed 16 hours in the Italian capital during which time the players disappeared . though the match was scheduled for Sunday in Rabat , the rest of the team will fly back to Ethiopia on Wednesday .
the already injury-hit Atlanta_Falcons said Tuesday they will be without tackle Renardo_Foster for the rest of the National_Football season . Foster was placed on injured reserve with a torn left knee ligament , an injury sustained in Sunday 's 22-16 loss to the New_Orleans_Saints . Foster , 23 , was standing in at left tackle for Wayne_Gandy , who was knocked out for the season with a knee injury . Foster is the third Atlanta offensive lineman to suffer a long-term knee injury , along with Gandy and starting right tackle Todd_Weiner . Weiner had arthroscopic surgery and was expected to miss at least a month .

Alencar spent the day meeting with agriculture minister Roberto_Rodrigues , who favors legalization , and environment minister Marina_Silva , who wants patent-owner monsanto to do an environmental impact study .

Russia opposes any proposed withdrawal of un peacekeeping troops from the former Yugoslavia and will not pull its own troops out of the area , foreign minister Andrei_Kozyrev said on Thursday . Kozyrev , speaking at a press conference , stated the Russian position barely a day after un chief Boutros_Boutros-Ghali warned un peacekeepers could be pulled out of Bosnia-hercegovina failing a peace settlement . `` we will not withdraw peacekeeping forces because alternatives remain , '' he said .

Ban , who arrived late Monday , went to the genocide memorial in Kigali to pay homage to the victims of the massacres , which left some 800,000 people dead , mainly from the tutsi minority of president Paul_Kagame . Ban was also due to hold talks with Kagame Tuesday as well as with several other officials before flying on to Addis_Ababa for an African_Union heads of state summit .

China has agreed to free on humanitarian grounds an ailing Filipino man serving 10 years in a Chinese jail for murder , the Philippines foreign department said Monday . Rizalde_Astrolabio , 40 , is to be sent home on Tuesday , three-and-a-half years into his prison sentence , following an appeal from Manila , foreign undersecretary Jose_Brillantes told reporters . Astrolabio stabbed a Chinese man to death during a brawl at a karaoke bar in China in 1999 , the foreign department said . he has diabetes , hypertension and suffers from depression , and his condition has deteriorated while in prison , it added .

Egypt and Iran have not had diplomatic ties since 1980 , but relations have been thawing recently , and the two leaders met earlier this month in Geneva .

Poland and Spain in particular are seeking to reverse changes the constitution would make to their voting rights .

Italian actor Alberto_Sordi , who began his film career dubbing Oliver_Hardy 's voice , died overnight in Rome , the ansa news agency said on Tuesday . he was 83 . the round-bodied Sordi got his start at age 13 , winning a Hardy lookalike contest sponsored by US film studio MGM , and later became a stand-up comedian . he became a genuine star of the big screen in Federico_Fellini 's `` il vitelloni '' -lrb- 1953 -rrb- and in his long career played in at least 150 films . Sordi was born on June 15 , 1919 in Rome and remained a beloved figure in his home city . he was made honorary mayor for a day in 1999 to celebrate his 80th birthday .

Swiss composer Heinrich_Sutermeister died here Thursday , aged 84 , his family announced Friday . his first opera `` romeo and juliet '' was performed in the German city of Dresden in 1940 and was later translated into five languages . he adapted numerous operas and composed a `` missa da requiem '' in 1953 interpreted by Elisabeth_Schwarzkopf . from 1958 to 1975 , Sutermeister was professor of free composition at the state highschool for music in Hannover , Germany . he had been a member of the Bavarian academy of fine arts since 1977 .

Santer predicted that the single European currency would play a more important role than existing currencies . he also underlined the danger of delaying introduction of the euro , saying that would inevitably lead to relinquishing efforts to strengthen economies . `` i am afraid that if we now put back the date for entry , it will be delayed by a generation , '' Santer said .
