US president Barack_Obama Thursday vowed to support un moves to bring to justice the killers of slain Lebanese prime minister Rafiq_Hariri ahead of the fourth anniversary of the assassination . `` as we share our grief with the Lebanese people over the loss of prime minister Hariri , we also share our conviction that his sacrifice will not be in vain , '' Obama said in a statement ahead of Saturday 's anniversary . `` The_United_States fully supports the Special_Tribunal_for_Lebanon , whose work will begin in a few weeks , to bring those responsible for this horrific crime and those that followed to justice . '' .
talks on plans for Palestinian elections failed to produce any progress ahead of a meeting between PLO chief Yasser_Arafat and Israeli prime minister Yitzhak_Rabin , the chief Palestinian negotiator here said Wednesday . `` unfortunately , i have nothing to tell chairman Arafat which could make tomorrow 's summit a success , '' negotiator Saeb_Erekat said ahead of the summit Thursday at the erez crossing from Israel to the Gaza_Strip .
The_Senate Finance_Committee voted unanimously Tuesday to approve Robert_Rubin 's nomination for treasury secretary . in testimony to the committee , Rubin reiterated the administration 's pledge to back a strong dollar , saying it was in the short - and long - term interest of the US economy . Rubin , who had been a top White_House economic advisor , stressed that the United_States had to keep a tight rein on budget deficits and that any tax cuts had to be matched by reductions in spending . Rubin was nominated to replace Lloyd_Bentsen , who resigned in December for personal reasons .
former British prime minister Lady_Thatcher met South_African president Nelson_Mandela , at his request , for about 20 minutes at Buckingham_Palace early Friday , her office confirmed . Mandela is wrapping up a four-day state visit to Britain . Thatcher 's government refused to impose sanctions on the apartheid regime in South_Africa , and in 1987 she described the African_National_Congress -lrb- ANC -rrb- as `` a typical terrorist organization '' .
Russia intends to send a neutron gun to Mars aboard a US space mission scheduled to be launched in 2009 , space scientist Igor_Mitrofanov said Thursday . the plutonium-powered neutron emitter will be able to probe the martian soil to a depth of one meter -lrb- three feet -rrb- , said Mitrofanov , laboratory head at the Institute_of_Space studies of the Russian academy of sciences . the device , which will be carried on the national aeronautics and space adminstration 's Mars_Science_Laboratory , will analyze the composition of the soil for the duration of two earth years and also seek the presence of water .
Turkish foreign minister Erdal_Inonu is to visit Slovakia Thursday and Friday to sign a cooperation agreement and for talks with Slovakian counterpart Juraj_Schenk , Ankara announced Monday . Inonu will sign an accord on sporting , cultural , technical and scientific cooperation , a Turkish foreign ministry spokesman said , and hold talks with Schenk on strengthening bilateral ties . it will be the first visit by a Turkish government official to Slovakia since it was formed when the former Czechoslovakia broke up January 1 , 1993 .
Chechen separatist leader Dzhokhar_Dudayev on Sunday ruled out any negotiations with the Russian government and promised to step up the armed struggle for his republic 's independence . Dudayev was speaking to a group of reporters at a secret location in southern Chechnya . he also said he hoped that Boris_Yeltsin would fail in his bid for a second term in office when Russia votes in presidential elections in June . it was Yeltsin who poured Russian troops and firepower into Chechnya in December 1994 to crush the independence movement , triggering a war that has become a major issue in the election campaign .
US president Barack_Obama on Saturday said he stood `` foursquare '' behind South_Korean leader Lee_Myung-Bak , as he scolded North_Korea for its `` irresponsible behavior . '' `` we stand foursquare behind him , '' Obama said as he met with Lee , just after the g8 leaders issued a tough statement condemning the alleged North_Korean attack that sank a South_Korean warship in March . Lee vowed Seoul `` will react swiftly and strongly '' to prevent another attack by North_Korea .
European_Union foreign policy chief Javier_Solana arrived in Ukraine on Tuesday for a second round of mediation in a political crisis sparked by the country 's disputed presidential election . he was expected later Tuesday to meet with Ukrainian president Leonid_Kuchma for talks about the contested November 21 vote . Solana was due to be joined in Kiev on Wednesday by Polish president Aleksander_Kwasniewski and other European leaders , who unsuccessfully tried to mediate an end to the conflict in a meeting with Kuchma and the two candidates Saturday .
militiamen loyal to faction leader Osman_Hassan_Ali `` Atto '' wrested control of a key airport in Somalia Wednesday from warlord Mohamed_Farah_Aidid , Osman_Atto announced . the fighting left at least two gunmen dead and nine wounded , he said . it was the first major battle reported between the two factions since Osman_Atto split with Aidid -- accusing him of being a `` warmonger '' -- as un troops withdrew from this lawless Horn_of_Africa_nation last March .

Greek and Turkish_Cypriot leaders are also due to take part in the talks .

center-right candidate Alvaro_Colom on Monday conceded victory to Oscar_Berger , a former mayor of the Guatemalan capital , in a presidential runoff , pledging a `` democratic , constructive '' opposition . with some 94.2 percent of ballots counted , Grand_National_Alliance candidate Berger had taken 54.1 percent of the vote compared with 45.8 percent for Colom in the race to succeed president Alfonso_Portillo on January 14 , the Supreme_Electoral_Tribunal said .
Reserve_Bank_of_Australia -lrb- RBA -rrb- deputy governor Ian_Macfarlane will be appointed the new governor of the central bank , treasurer Peter_Costello announced Wednesday . current governor Bernie_Fraser , who was closely linked to the labor government which lost power in March , will retire when his seven-year term expires next month . RBA governors are traditionally selected from within the bank , although Fraser served as the head of the Treasury_Department before his appointment . Costello said last week that the government had looked outside the bank for candidates , fuelling speculation that an `` outsider '' might be selected for the top job .
Iranian officials denied on Sunday reports that its security forces seized seven US troops near the islamic republic 's border with Pakistan , tehran-based Al-Alam television reported . `` no American troops have been arrested . we deny it , '' Ali_Mohammad_Azad , the governor general of Iran 's Sistan-Baluchestan_province , told the arabic language network . the channel said a source with the provincial border patrol services had also denied the arrest reported earlier by a hardline news website close to the elite Revolutionary_Guards .

the interior minister of the German state of Saxony-Anhalt , Manfred_Puechel of the opposition SPD party , had a molotov cocktail thrown at at his car late Wednesday but he escaped unharmed , police said Thursday . the minister 's car was near a level crossing , around two kilometres -lrb- one mile -rrb- from Magdeburg in eastern Germany , when it was overtaken by a second vehicle . one of the passengers hurled a molotov cocktail at Puechel 's car , but missed the target . Puechel was returning from Stendal where he attended an SPD meeting , a ministry spokesman said . police have opened an investigation .

a man in a northern Indian_village killed his mother by throwing a television set at her , the Press_Trust_of_India news agency reported Saturday . the incident took place late Friday in the village of behwalpur , in the hoshairpur district of Punjab . according to the report , Manjit_Kaur asked her son Hardev_Singh to turn the television 's volume down . but instead of heeding to her request , Singh threw the set on his mother 's head , knocking her unconscious . Kaur was rushed to the hospital where she was declared dead . a case has been registered against Singh .
Pakistani troops killed two Chechen militants on Sunday during a military operation against Al-Qaeda suspects and their tribal supporters in the remote area bordering Afghanistan , a senior security official said . `` the militants have been identified as chechens , '' brigadier Mehmood_Shah , chief of security for the tribal zone told a press conference here . `` they were killed while trying to flee the area , '' Shah said . the militants were killed on the fourth day of a continuing operation to capture foreign and local fighters loyal to Al-Qaeda in the South_Waziristan region near the Afghan border .
Portuguese prime minister Jose_Manuel_Durao_Barroso on Monday welcomed Ireland 's weekend endorsement of the nice treaty that paves the way to an expanded European_Union . `` we obviously have a better situation now that Ireland has voted in favour , '' he told reporters following a meeting with president Jorge_Sampaio . `` the road to enlargement is now unblocked . '' nearly two-thirds of Irish voters gave their approval to the Nice_Treaty on EU expansion -- which they rejected last year -- opening the door for 10 nations to join the bloc in 2004 . Portugal joined the union in 1986 .

'' however , Chechen vice president Vaza_Arsanov denied that his republic , which is seeking independence from Moscow , was involved in the attack . Atta_Abu Rashta was charged with being the spokesman for the `` Islamic_Liberation_Party , '' which has never been recognised by the Jordanian authorities due to its extremist stand against the monarchy . in 1993 Jordan officially authorised most political parties banned in 1957 following an abortive coup blamed on ultra leftwing groups . Abu_Rashta , of Palestinian origin , is already serving a three-year sentence imposed at the start of 1996 for slandering King_Hussein .

a scientist is warning that yellow fever -- a mosquito-borne disease that is nearly always fatal -- is making a comeback in the Brazilian_Amazon region . researcher Marcus_Barros said on Saturday that his team has published an article in the British journal `` The_Lancet '' urging all tourists visiting the region to get vaccinated against yellow fever . the vaccine is no longer required because the disease is considered eradicated . but according to Barros , 13 cases of yellow fever have been recorded in the Brazilian state of Amazonas since the start of the year . all but two were fatal . the victims include a Swiss tourist who died 10 days after leaving Brazil .
Taiwan 's President_Lee teng-hui will visit Nicaragua next year at the invitation of president-elect Arnoldo_Aleman , the press office of the ruling Liberal_Alliance_party announced Thursday . the date of the visit had yet to be set . the invitation to lee was relayed by foreign minister-designate Emilio_Alvarez during a recent visit to Taiwan . Nicaragua has maintained diplomatic relations with Taiwan since 1990 , shortly after president Violeta_Chamorro took office .
Algerian president Liamine_Zeroual on Thursday appointed a new finance minister , Abdelkrim_Harchaoui , in place of Ahmed_Benbitour , a government statement said . Benbitour was `` called to other duties '' , the statement said . Harchaoui was replaced at the ministry of trade by Belaid_Bakhti . in another change , Abdesselam_Bouchouareb , the chairman of the economic and social council , became minister of industrial restructuring and participation in place of Mourad_Benachenhou .

Greek foreign minister Theodore_Pangalos said Monday he plans to spend the weekend in Albania to inaugurate a consulate in the south of the country . Pangalos will have talks on bilateral and regional issues with his Albanian counterpart Tritan_Shehu , who will host a dinner for him Saturday in the seaside city of Vlore , he told reporters . Shehu will attend the inauguration of the Gjirokaster consulate , Pangalos said , hailing what he called an `` infrequent '' occasion . `` Greece 's relations with Albania are excellent , the best we have currently with any country in the region , '' Pangalos said .
Iran 's main armed opposition , the people 's mujahedeen , called on moslem countries Wednesday to boycott an islamic conference to be held in Tehran in December . mujahedeen leader Massud_Rajavi said the Tehran summit of the Organisation_of_the_Islamic_Conference `` would grant the regime an opportunity to justify its crimes in the name of islam . '' in a message to moslem heads of state , the paris-based Rajavi referred to a German court verdict accusing Iranian leaders of ordering the 1992 murders of kurdish dissidents in Berlin . `` a regime whose leaders are but a handful of criminals and outlaws is in no way competent to host the summit , '' he said in his statement issued from Paris .
US journalist Tom_Quinn died Sunday in the Colombian capital when he lost control of the car he was driving , police said . Quinn 's wife , Suleima_Reyes , was seriously injured in the accident , police said . Quinn lived in Colombia for 30 years where he was a correspondent for Time_magazine .
Serbian third seed Novak_Djokovic qualified for the Rome_Masters semi-finals on Friday after his Spanish opponent Nicolas_Almagro retired with a wrist problem . the Australian open champion had cantered through the first set 6-1 and broke Almagro in the first game of the second to prompt the Spaniard to throw in the towel . Djokovic will face Radek_Stepanek , who ousted world number one Roger_Federer in the quarter-finals , on Saturday .

Iraqi education minister Fahd_Salem al-shakra sent a letter to US president George_W._Bush urging him not to give in to the `` logic of war '' , the state news agency INA reported Sunday . shakra called on Bush not to `` give in to the logic of war and to focus all US capabilities to serve humanity , '' INA said . news of the letter , the first such move by an Iraqi minister , came as the United_States was taking part in a three-way summit in the Azores that could lead to imminent military action against Baghdad .

doncaster captain Brian_Stock scored a goal in each half on Tuesday as the second-tier strugglers saw off cheltenham 3-0 to secure a glamour FA_Cup fourth round tie at home to Aston_Villa this weekend . Stock was first to react in the 26th minute after Martin_Woods 's free-kick hit the crossbar . and doncaster were 2-0 up against their third-tier opponents before half-time . Sam_Hird scored from close range after he pounced on John_Spicer 's deflected shot from a Woods corner . the prima donna of Turkish opera , Semiha_Berksoy , died Sunday at an Istanbul hospital , aged 94 , her daughter zeliha told Anatolia_news_agency . she died as she was recovering from heart surgery . `` everything had gone fine but she died this morning in intensive care , '' said her daughter . born from an Istanbul family in 1910 in the waning days of the ottoman empire , Berksoy took classes at the city 's conservatory and later pursued her studies in Berlin . she is known to have stunned Kemal_Ataturk , the founder of modern Turkey , with her renditions of operas by strauss and wagner . Berksoy was also a successful painter .

'' .

-lrb- by Edward_Chen -rrb- President_Lee teng-hui visited victims of the Sept. 21 earthquake in Puli Chen , Nantou_County , on Sunday morning . the Chinese head of state , accompanied by Taiwan governor Chao_Shou-po , Nantou magistrate peng pei-hsian and Puli town chief chang hong-ming , visited quake victims now living in tents and prefabricated houses to view in person their current living situation . lee also gave them cash as a token of his concern . the president told them that the government will do whatever it can to help them resolve their problems and reconstruct their homes . later in the afternoon , lee visited victims in Chungliao hsiang and Nantou_City .
Russian energy giant gazprom on Tuesday expressed doubt whether Ukrainian state gas firm naftogaz will be able to pay the latest bill for deliveries of Russian gas . `` it is still not clear whether naftogaz will be able to pay on time its bill for May gas deliveries . the payment must be made by June 7 , '' said gazprom chief executive Alexei_Miller after talks with officials from Ukraine 's gas firm . a standoff between Russia and Ukraine in January over Kiev 's failure to settle bills led to Europe 's worst energy crisis of modern times with several countries deprived of Russian gas for two weeks .

Albania 's government on Wednesday rejected an ultimatum from rebels in the south for president Sali_Berisha to resign by Thursday , state-run television said . `` ultimatums are unacceptable . we favour dialogue , '' prime minister Bashkim_Fino of the Socialist_Party said . Fino was brought in to head a government of national unity with Berisha 's conservative Democratic_Party last week in a bid to end a popular uprising that has led to anarchy in Europe 's pooorest country .

Indian prime minister Manmohan_Singh ruled out Wednesday redrawing India 's borders with Pakistan as a solution to their dispute over Kashmir . Pakistani president Pervez_Musharraf suggested last month that parts of Kashmir , which is currently divided between Pakistan and India , be demilitarised be placed under United_Nations mandate or under joint control . `` i have made it clear to president Musharraf that any redrawing of the international border is not acceptable to us . any proposal which smacks of further division is not going to be acceptable to us , '' Singh told a press conference here .

'' .
